name: Billy Hollis
text: Very friendly, and they really care about your fur baby. My family moved here from Nevada and we needed a good, honest veterinarian that care about animals and wants the best for them. This place was all of that. I am so thankful to have found them. The Doctor was super friendly and explained everything as did her assistant that was always in the room with me and my precious Daisy.  I thank God for leading me to a great doctor that really does love and care about animals.

resp.text: Daisy is a sweet kitty and we are certainly glad she is on her way to feeling better. Thank you for trusting us with her care. 🐾

name: Marnie Weaver
text: Dr. Jubb has been my pets vet for a while. We recently moved 3 hours away and I drove all the way back to have my fur baby treated. They treat my baby just like their own ❤

resp.text: Thank you for letting us care for your family!! We certainly hope your baby is feeling better. 🐾

name: Tiffany Thomas
text: I brought my dog Lincoln in with a swelled face. Turns out he had an absessed tooth. The staff had him feeling better and had us in and out in thirty minutes with his medication! I highly recommend them!

resp.text: So happy he is feeling better. Thank you for allowing to tend to him! 🐾

name: Jennie Swafford
text: We have just arrived in the city of Florence. A neighbor referred us to this facility. We relocated from out of state. They took us on as a client. Our dog was very comfortable with the surroundings and not anxious with any of the staff. The place is very clean and comfortable. The staff took time to welcome us and find out our needs. The technican was very friendly and very attentive in listening to the history of our dog. Explained everything that was to happen, answered all of our questions and told us about the facility and doctors. Very impressed with the doctor. We plan to make this our vets and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a vet in the Florence area. Dr. Baggett was great and explained everything to us. We will definitely be back with our dog Holly.

name: Natalie Aldridge
text: Dr. Baggett got my little man on the road to recovery! He explained everything in detail, and what we would do next, if needed. I had zero questions about the care my Jalen was getting. The staff is wonderful, especially reception. They make you feel like you’re right at home. I highly recommend!

resp.text: 🐾 Glad J baby is better 🐶 🤍

name: Jeneen Bowen
text: Dr. Jubb is the Best with any animal. Loving, kind, down to earth and yet skilled and knowledgeable!!! We absolutely love her, her daughter and the rest of the team. We’ve been taking our animals there over 25 years and will continue ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for always trusting us with each of your family members. Thankful to have been part of their care for many years!

name: Rebecca Swinea
text: Oscar's problem was explained and addressed.  I was given instructions to prevent a recurrence.

name: Patsy Sharp
text: I was very satisfied with the care of my new puppy,thay were super friendly and took the time to explain everything to me about the care of my puppy and throughly explained how to give his medicine,thay made me feel that my puppy was being treated the best!!! Thank you!!!!!♥️🌸

resp.text: I am so glad that we were able to help your fluffy boy! Looking forward to seeing him grow. 🐾

name: Jill Patterson
text:
I've been using West Lauderdale Veterinary Clinic since 2004. Dr Jubb and her staff have always been attentive to my pets needs in a timely, professional
and caring manner. Without reservation,  I highly recommend them.

name: Scot F
text: They turned away my sick cat did have appointment but who can make a appointment every time when your animal is sick you got no choice but to take your animal to a doctor they were very rude and turned me and my cat away  just blows me away a vet can turn away paying customers in there time of need animals don't get sick on are time they just get sick . Your one place  place

resp.text: Our doctors and medical team rotate lunches and there is a small window when we are not able to see outpatients. When your cat was presented to our office today was during that window. Our receptionist stated that we would be glad to get your pet worked in but it would be a 30 minute wait. The lady that brought your pet chose to try another location that could see her immediately. We try and accommodate all of our clients and patients needs, but sometimes it is necessary that a small wait occur.

name: Julia Layman
text: This is by far the best place to take your animals to,they treat you and your pet like family,not just a business,they take time to answer all your questions.i will continue using them as my pets vet!!!,thank you for the great care of my snowshoe!!!

name: Eddie Thigpen
text: I always feel goid about leaving my Lila at West Lauderdale Veterinarian!  They are always caring and do all they can to meet our needs!

name: Taylor Rowe
text: I was blown away by the helpful staff, wonderful customer service and the vet! Dr. Jubb and Ashley sat down and explained what was going on with my pup and exactly what to do to take care of her. I have been to many vets over the years and this is by far the best experience! I will be making them my vet from now on!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a wonderful experience with us! We certainly appreciate you allowing us to care for your pup! Have a great New Year and we look forward to seeing you in the future.

name: rebstroh haberstroh
text: Amazing service from the entire staff. Had an emergency Saturday visit after our dog was bitten by another dog while visiting the lake. Our dog is normally  anxious while visiting his vet but Dr Hale and her crew kept him calm and got him fixed up. In and out within 20 minutes very reasonable priced.  They also went out of there way to email everything they had  diagnosed and prescribed so we would have for our home vet. Highly recommend super  compassionate care.

name: McKinna Palmer
text: Dr. Judd and her staff could not be any kinder. They took such good care of my baby today and saw him with a very small wait. This is definitely our new vet home.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! Glad you had a great experience and we were able to help you quickly!

name: Melinda Hargett
text: I have used WLVH for many years. Very kind and compassionate people, especially Dr. Jubb.

name: Debbie Banes
text: Friendly & knowledgeable staff! Dr Jubb is an obvious animal lover and takes care of our pets like they are her own.

name: Trace Times
text: Receptionists are very friendly. The vet was somewhat pushy and was not very receptive to questions about where you money was going.

name: Britt
text: Poor customer service, this vet is more concerned with money than health of the animals. Refused to approve a prescription from a known pharmacy due to not accepting "3rd party requests". Didn't tell us this until after paying the $450 for 2 dogs' annual vaccinations. Take the extra time to drive further for vet who cares about the actual health of the animal.

name: Gary Utley
text: We have trusted Dr. Jubb and her staff for over 25 year's.

name: Leslie Brown
text: Very nice vet. Looking forward to going back.

name: Jessica Long
text: My family has been using Dr. Rider for as long as I can remember, 10-15 years at least. I absolutely love her and her passion. She is always willing to go out of her way even when she is not working. She has personally saved 3 of my animals, a few of my grandmother's cats and 1 of our childhood dogs. She helped me keep my baby girl alive for 20 years, until there was nothing she could do and my baby passed on her own, but I will say she did everything in her power to give me one more day. I would recommend Dr. Rider always! Her staff has been very helpful to us as well!!

name: Steve Geyer
text: Countryside staff is consistently courteous friendly and they really love Riley… or at least they’re really good at acting like they do🙂. We have been impressed with the level of care for our pup and professionalism of the staff. Highly recommend.

name: Dan Broadwater
text: Love the staff and the services they provide💯

name: Michael Dean
text: Under the circumstances with Covid, the practice is doing exceptional curbside business. We were able to wait comfortably in our vehicle. Thank you for the advice and taking care of my new family member.

name: Stephen Geyer
text: When we moved recently from the Atlanta area, we were concerned about finding a good Veterinarian. To our surprise we found a GREAT one. We highly recommend Dr. Rider and her team. A+++

name: M Stevens
text:
Countryside took good care of our beagle over a ten year period from pup until having to put her down due to severe medical issues. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable​ and compassionate.
We have been taking our rescue American Bulldog/Argentine Dogo to Countryside for the last 7yrs and our sons Black & Tan Coon dog recently from pup now going towards 1yr. We as a family appreciate so much the great care or dogs receive there.

name: Christina Strong
text: The staff is very friendly.   Dr. Rider is very loving and caring to my furbaby.  She takes time to explain everything!

name: Kelo Hunter
text: Love everyone at Countryside Vet, they're so helpful & really caring to my Bella!

name: Nita L
text: Everyone here is very nice! Good vet

name: Lexi Montee
text: Used to love this place as they were so accommodating and helpful. I called them about 8 minutes ago asking for help with a neighborhood cat that is extremely matted and needed to be groomed. Told us they weren’t our vet anymore and I’m guessing they’re doing this since we had trouble with them awhile back when my dog got extremely sick after boarding him there for a week. Wouldn’t recommend this place anymore honestly.

My wife and I moved to Auburn a little over a year ago and we needed to find a new clinic for our dogs, Lucy & Domino. A few of our friends had recommended Countryside and, needless to say, the level of care and the friendliness by their staff have always met and exceeded our expectations. Couldn't recommend a better place! Thank y'all so much! 🐶🐾

name: Linda McDaniel
text:
Dr Rider & staff are very compassionate about your fur babies & you as well.
Have used this office for 15 years & always received excellent service & care.
Highly recommend this veterinarian clinic for your fur babies.

name: Constance Smith
text: Very friendly staff. They all care about your animals instead of just trying to get your money. I've never had any problems with this vet clinic since I've been taking my pets there. Would recommend Countryside Vet Clinic to everyone that has fur babies.

name: Vicki Barnes
text: We’ve used Countryside for many years. We absolutely love Dr. Rider and her staff!

name: Jonna Threadgill
text:
Dr Rider and all of her staff are amazing!! They have gone above and beyond to help us provide for our local rescues at Woof Ave Rescue. Absolutely, LOVE countryside and I recommend them to EVERYONE I know!!!
Not to mention...all my own personal fur babies!!

name: Mary Dawson
text: Dr. Rider and all of her staff are wonderful! They are honest, open and upfront about your animal's conditions and prognosis. They do what is in the best interest of the animal and owner. They are also the best priced vet I've dealt with. I would recommend them 100%.

name: Tye Lott
text: Very professional and friendly people.

name: Paula Johnston
text: We have used Countryside several times to board our dogs and have been very happy with the care they received while we were out of town.  My daughter also had a pet ferret that was very sick.  We took it to Dr. Rider, since she also works with exotic animals.  Sadly, it had to be put to sleep, but Dr. Rider was so kind, caring, and compassionate.  I highly recommend Dr. Rider and the staff at Countryside Veterinary Clinic!

name: Jenna Reynolds
text: The staff and Dr. Ryder have been so great - welcoming, willing to answer any questions, and loving to my dogs. They love going to the vet. We've been going there for 3 years and have kept our dogs in the kennel many times. Definitely recommend Countryside for the price (VERY reasonable) and quality!

name: Belinda Doyle
text:
We love Dr Laura!
She looked after our sweet yellow lab Smoke and the sad day we had to say goodbye to him.
She has cared for our Smooth from her first appointment as a puppy and now she is a sleek beautiful full grown lab and Molly our precious tan and brown terrier rescue is flourishing.
She, her staff and associate vets have given us wonderful, competent and very compassionate care though the years.

name: Larry Keeble
text: We have been using Countryside Veterinary Clinic for the past 3 - 4 years and have been very pleased with all their services.  We board our Yorkie on occasion, had his teeth deep cleaned and have all his annual shots and other treatments completed there as well.  They've been really good to us and to our 6 year old Yorkie.

name: Sue Koons
text: I give Dr Ryder and staff an A !

name: Linda Lyon
text: Dr Rider and her staff are very helpful and understanding.  They will go out of their way to listen to your concerns.  The office is not "fancy" but the prices are good and the care top notch.

name: Frank Ware
text: Flexible, efficient, and - most of all - caring. Also, the location is not jammed into a congested area and has an outdoor grass area to walk your pets before and after their visit.

name: John Usman
text: The service here is wonderful. Dr. Ryder is very polite and she answers all of my questions no matter how dumb they are. The staff is very polite and courteous. I will continue to use this office, and have no reservations recommending Country Side to anyone. Never once did they try and push some expensive products. They take great care of my dog, and I am highly satisfied.

name: Ess Dee
text: Highly professional.  I think they care about your pet as much as the customers. My dog seems excited to go into the building whenever I take her.

name: Melissa Han
text: Very friendly and honest staff. It gets busy sometimes but that's always a good sign. There daycare system is great too. Always have an eye on my dogs and they make sure my dogs feel at home during the stay whether long or short.

name: Sarah Woods
text: I love Countryside! I was referred by a lady who saw my dog and I at PetCo. The staff is very friendly and appear to have love for the pets. My ONLY complaint was the wait time to see the doctor, which was about 20 minutes.

name: Kayla Loomis
text: We have been using this vet for almost 9 yrs. Ever since we found a mastiff puppy ate up with mange. They are amazing. They listen when you think you know what's going on, they are patient with the dogs (our hound has a lot of anxiety). We now have 6 dogs and all of them go to here. I will never use another vet as long as I get an option.

name: Carolyn Crouse
text: We have used this clinic since the 90's.  Love the care they give our animals and their customer service.  When we board our Cocker Spaniel for a time, she comes out happy and well taken care of.

name: courtney calvert
text: Countryside is the best vet we have ever used. Dr. Rider and her staff are amazing! They treat your pets like family and have always gone above and beyond for us.

name: Christopher DiStasio
text: Countryside has great people to help and costs are very reasonable.

name: V West
text: Dr Rider, and staff at Countryside Vet Clinic has taken great  care of our 2 dogs for years for regular visit as well as emergency visit. They were treated with TLC just as we would treat them as owners. They understand how important our pets are to the families.

name: Sheree Satterwhite
text: I can't begin to explain how wonderful Dr Laura and he staff is. She is not just a doctor for your fur babies, she is an lover of animals. She takes all the time you need her and she sympathizes with you on how you are feeling. I would highly recommend her as your vet.

name: Patrick Chandlier
text: The office staff was very professional and nice. The doctor did a fantastic job with my cat and dog. She was very informative and took a lot of time with both of my animals. Great experience.

name: Wendie Vann
text: Loved them!!! They were great with my dog!!!  They did not try to push products, to pad the bill.  I moved to Opelika 3 years ago, and had driven to Millbrook to use the Vet. I had used for years.  It was time to find a local Veterinary Clinic and I really liked Countryside.  Will go back again.

name: Debbie Keeble
text: We have used Countryside for about 3 years.  Our 6 year old Yorkie has stayed there while we are on vacation each year.  He gets all his shots there and has had some dental work done to keep his teeth looking good and helping bad breath too.  They have helped us with good advice on several occasions.  We are very satisfied  with our experience.

name: Karen Threadgill
text: Recently relocated to the area and Countryside came highly recommended. After 2 visits with 2 of my dogs know that they will be our new vet. Very happy with the interaction and treatment.

name: Paula Belcher
text: No long wait.  My dogs are usually cured the first time so I don't have to take them back again and again.  Love Dr. Ryder, the best!!

name: Stevi Kincade
text: Super nice staff, calmed my concerns about my ferret andd definitely gave me confidnece anad comfort as a pet owner.

name: Jennifer Manning
text: Dr. Rider and her staff are the best! They take care of all my furbabies on the spot when needed! Definitely recommend them to anyone, very trusting vet to take your pet!

name: Sharon Reese
text: Countryside is the best veterinary clinic in town. They take really good care of my max. He has been going every since he was six weeks old and they are great wth him. I really love the products that they use when they give him a bath it smells so good and I just love it.

name: Courtney Noblitt
text: Love this place!!! Been going there for years  and will continue to go. They're great with our animals and our animals love them!

name: shawnte webb
text: Best customer service. The veterinarian listen to our concerns about our puppy. Was very helpful in prescribing medication. They are friendly I love their service.

name: Nick
text: The staff is great and very accommodating; however, I must tell you my dog came back once with kennel cough and again with dandruff. Great place, but I just can't see myself going back.

name: laurelscarioni
text: Everyone was very friendly and took great care of my dog! Dr. Rider had my little guy feeling better fast and made sure I understood what was wrong and how to help him recover.

name: Cj Do
text: Staff is extremely nice and helpful. They took care of my guinea pig and he's healthy again! The only vet I trust with my babies! Definitely recommend going to them!

name: JoAnn Grier
text: I love this vet so much!!! I have a little Yorkie that suffers from flea Allergy and unfortunately he also has a bad reaction to any type of flea control. I live close to a dog park so it's a problem during the summer. I called my vet and of course they were not available so I called Countryside and they were so nice and said bring him it right away. I loved Dr. Ryder from day one. She takes up time with him and because I know my Little Man so well she really listens to what I have to say. The whole staff is so sweet and very professional at the same time. When I went to pay my bill I was pleasantly surprised. Dr. Ryder doesn't always make us come in to pay a dr's visit every time either. There has been a few occasions when they were able to call in some meds for him. I have seen the same vet for years and to be honest I wish I had been using Countryside Vet the whole time. I would recommend this vet to anyone who loves there animals, if fact I have sent several of my co-workers there. Thank you Countryside Vet for taking care of my baby and for loving him, almost as much as I do!!! :-)

name: DeAnna Hand
text: Amazing and helpful staff! They go above and beyond to make you and your pet feel cared for.

name: Wynter Bonner
text: Everyone is so kind and helpful.

name: Diann Holman
text: I always feel better after Dr. Rider checks out my baby. She takes the time to listen and has an understanding attitude of my concerns.

name: Daffny Pierce
text: We have been customers for Country Side Vet for over 15 years. They always take great care of our pets.

name: MR KIBBLEBITZ
text: Very pleasant helped my 13 year old cat feel better!

name: Michael Johnson
text: love this place. Best vet I have ever used. I drive  back from Atlanta to continue to see them.

name: Charline Parker
text: Outstanding care of my Cooper, Lola, and Khaleesi! Even though we are still curbside, Dr Rider and staff were exemplary in their communication, concern, and treatment of my babies upper respiratory infections. They even followed up to see how they are feeling on the medicines to ensure everything is working as it should. I could not ask for a better Dr and staff for my babies.

name: Jessica Bartlett
text: Wonderful! They are kind with our puppy and have very fair prices. Very happy we chose them:)

name: Jonathan Hallford
text: I love this place. They treat my dogs like they are one of their own.

name: Susette Urmeneta
text: Compassionate and personal care. Have been taking my pets there for nine years.

name: Ry
text: Such an amazing vets office the entire team is extremely trust worthy and very kind

name: Sarah Marshall
text: Dr. Ryder and her staff are absolutely the most caring team for both the animal pets and their humans.  She has been my vet for 15 years through 7 pets, loss, grief, and the wonderful world of pets.

name: Sarah Bridgman
text: There very caring and loving to my babies and looking forward to continuing using them

name: Syd
text: Did a great job declawing and neutering my kitten. Love this vet. Very nice staff.

name: Hayden Shaw
text: Went it and told them what's wrong with my puppy. They say everything is fine and take my money. Two weeks later having the same problem the vet said wasn't there. Repeat cycle of lazy vets

name: Bob Nelson
text: We've been with Countryside for over two decades.  Dr. Rider is very professional and is always willing to spend time explaining things to us.

name: Donna Perry
text: It was perfect, thank you

name: Joseph Smith
text: While out of Country we had a pet emergency, We had our Neighbor take our pet to be treated at Countryside Veterinary Clinic. We had the phone number written down with instructions to call if there were any problems with all 3 of our dogs. Dog was taken care of and it paid off to plan ahead. We've been taking our dogs there for almost 20 years.

name: Wanda Lilly
text: Have use Countryside Veterinary for all 4 of my dogs over 13 years. Great customer service and the doctor is awesome would recommend others

name: Ariel Ryberg
text: Love this place! Super friendly, very helpful, and to the point!

name: CoolSavage KidGamez
text: Always attentive to their needs with prompt, courtesy and informative information for our pets best care.

name: Tye Lott
text: Very professional and friendly people.

name: Michelle Brown
text: Very kind to both me and my dog Thor.  Called and checked up on him the day after we visited.

name: Jonathan Hallford
text: I love this place. They treat my dogs like they are one of their own.

name: Carla Blatt
text: I feel like Bently gets the best care ever with Dr. Rider and her staff!!!!!

name: Christopher DiStasio
text: Countryside has great people to help and costs are very reasonable.

name: MR KIBBLEBITZ
text: Very pleasant helped my 13 year old cat feel better!

name: Sarah Bridgman
text: There very caring and loving to my babies and looking forward to continuing using them

name: Laura Griffin
text: Awesome staff and great care of all my fur babies

name: Sue Koons
text: I give Dr Ryder and staff an A !

name: Deborah Lindsey
text: Excellent care!!!

name: Jackie Jones
text: it was great except I thought prices would be lower.

name: Carla Blatt
text: I feel like Bently gets the best care ever with Dr. Rider and her staff!!!!!

name: Laura Griffin
text: Awesome staff and great care of all my fur babies

name: Mary Page
text: Dr Lara and her staff are kind and caring!!!

name: John McDonald
text: I have lived in this area for 10 years and this is my vet. They offer great service.

name: Matt Ledbetter
text: Best in town!  5 star service!

name: Rita Kenney
text: They found out what was wrong with my dog and fixed her when the other vets couldn't. I'd highly recommend her everyone.

name: Lisa Martin
text: My cat HATES going to the vet, but this time it was different.  I won't say she is waiting at the door to go, but she was much calmer with this vet.

name: Shari Blakeley
text: best care for my furbabies.

name: Michelle Brown
text: Very kind to both me and my dog Thor.  Called and checked up on him the day after we visited.

name: Christina Bailey
text: Friendly to me and my pets. I always know my pets will cared for here.

name: Melissa Smith
text: Very kind and attentive staff.

name: LaTonya Maddox
text: Love the staff and services!

name: LoveJesus Amen!
text: Awesome job!!

name: Sara Byrd
text: This vet clinic and it’s staff are outstanding in every way. Seriously, if I could even begin to convey their kindness, excellence, affordability and professionalism in one paragraph, EVERYONE would be using them. The facility is super clean, great atmosphere and you never have to wait long to be seen. The kindness from the staff is like medicine for your soul, makes you want to go out and do good deeds and be happy! I leave there every time feeling equally as satisfied and happy as I do when I leave church. I know my fur babies are in the hands of some amazing people! The level of care and compassion is worth it, believe me!

name: Jacqueline
text: The staff is wonderful here! And Dr. Mahan is the most kind and caring veterinarian I have ever met! I have been bringing my fur babies here for many years!!

name: Dora Mahaffey
text: New to area with a sick dog and was pleasantly surprised by the rapid appointment.  The care and attention to detail was wonderful. EVERY person I encountered over the three days was friendly, helpful and professional. Definitely will use their services again.

name: Chaplain Marcus Allison
text: I am so thankful for the kindness that was shown to me and my beautiful cat, my little man, Jerry Christian from Dr. Dixie and all the staff. Although Jerry couldn't get better and had to leave for heaven Dr. Dixie was so compassionate to us it really helped. They also sent a wonderful card that means so much .

name: Adam Graham
text: I have been using Westside for over 10 years.  They are always very helpful and will get what you need done to your animals.  If you have a problem with a pet I suggest you bring them here.  Very friendly staff,  great with animals.  I have a rednose pitbull named Star!  They treat her so well when she comes if like she doesn't want to leave,  so trust me when I say they know what they are doing here.  They do almost all animals from dogs, cats, cows, horse, and many more so if you are looking for a great animal doctor.. please visit them and tell them that you were referred by Adam Graham.  Thank you for taking the time to read my article

name: Cassandra Gibbs
text: This is hands down the best vet in town!  They truly love and care about every single animal that comes into the place!  They are always friendly and professional.  When my dog had cancer they went beyond my expectations and treated him like he was part of the family joining in on the fight.  Zorro didn’t make it but he lived longer than he would have thanks to these good people!  I have always and will forever use this vet for all my animals ❤️

name: T.roy
text: Great service, friendly staff, we've taken both our dogs and horses here.

name: Jason Morris
text: Great customer service extremely nice employees

name: Danielle M
text: Just moved from FL to Arab and was lucky enough to be referred to this animal hospital! Our dog suffered 3 seizures out of nowhere last night and they got us in first thing this morning for care! Pleasurable experience from the very beginning starting with the lovely lady, Angel answering my phone call, so caring and efficient   in helping us get my dog in ASAP. Due to Covid19 their lobby is still closed, but immediately on my arrival I called and someone came out to greet us and bring us in the side door to avoid traffic. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg came into the room quickly and already had briefed herself with the information about my dog’s blood work from another hospital the night before. She is so compassionate, knowledgeable, and thorough with explaining what she feels needs to be done for your animal. She listens to you and doesn’t make you feel rushed! You can tell she genuinely loves her career and cares for the animals! Amazing is all I can say. She and her whole staff 5 ⭐️. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg answered my million questions and personally got on the phone to update me on my dog’s treatment. They don’t do any procedure without talking to you first and getting your approval and they’re so affordable (not like FL). She is so reassuring and sweet. We will be returning here for sure and highly recommend this animal hospital! Thank you all so much for treating our Oliver.

name: Kat Lopez
text: Thank You for always taking such good care of my babies! Y’all are just simply amazing!! Trouble Dery says Thank You!!!!

name: OTG 76
text: Wonderful open house yesterday excellent staff . The only place I take my kids aka pets!!

name: Barron Latta
text: I had a stray cat that showed up at my house so I started feeding him. After I saw that he decided to make a home at my house I took him to Westside to have him neutered and to get all of his shots and anything else that he might need. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I can't remember the attending vets name but he was great. The price for all they did was very reasonable. My cat looks and feels so much better. I am very happy with their service and will be returning as needed.

name: Kimberly Ferris
text: Dr Mahan is a wonderful vet to all of our dogs. She has helped us with many foster dogs also. We have been going there for almost almost 19 yrs.  Wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: Amber Rigsby
text: We love Westside! This is the only Veterinary office we will ever use. Our main Veterinarian is Dr. Mahan and I cannot say enough about how amazing she has always been. Yesterday I ended up having to take our cat up there unplanned. We saw Dr. Wilks & I couldn't be more pleased. He was so amazing, took his time, interacted with our cat and made sure to thoroughly go over everything. I would definitely recommend them every time!

name: Amber Wilson
text: Used this vet for all my animals. Set up payment arrangements and have paid it off several times. Even paid a bill for an animal that wasn't mine. Staff acts like I've never paid bill. What I don't understand is why the staff is acting in this manner.

name: Peggy Ashburn
text: They have been our veterinarians for over 25 years.  All of our pets have received excellent care from everyone there.  I would not dream of going anywhere else! We have also boarded our pets there several times and they are cared for just like members of the family.  They are simply Top Notch!!

name: Billie Ellen Simpson
text: This has been my vet service provider since 1999. Everyone connected to this hospital is dedicated to the care of both the pet and its owner. They are professional,compassionate,understanding and always willing to work with you to achieve the best level of care possible for your pet. I wouldn't go any where else. In my opinion they are the best in the area.

name: Gary Ferris
text: We love veterinarian Dixie Mahan. She has always gone over and above for our various dogs and cat. She is patient and willing to discuss all options and answer in detail any questions that we have. And the prices are much more reasonable than in Huntsville to which we live closer.

name: Sandy McDonald
text: We've been using Westside Vet for over 20 years, wouldn't use anyone else. It doesn't matter to us which doctor we see, because they are all so friendly, caring and patient with our animals, and don't leave us until all our questions are answered. We've boarded our dogs there a few times and never worry about them, we know they are taken care of and loved.

name: stevenjsmith
text: Multiple visits I realized they add certain things to your bill without asking the customer . For example I took my cat and four kittens up there for shots and told them that is all I wanted and they charged me for a feline leukemia test and told me they do it for all adult felines. After calling and asking why they did it the female over the phone hung up on me. This I not the only time they have added charges to my bill. I don't think all the people leaving these reviews are actually looking at their invoice afterwards.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Smith, we are certainly very sorry that you were unhappy with your visit. On Thursday, you dropped your cat off to be spayed and requested that she receive all vaccinations recommended for an outdoor cat. We spayed her and gave her a rabies vaccine, feline distemper vaccine, and feline leukemia vaccine. We did not test her for feline leukemia. It is not our office policy to test all adult cats. A feline leukemia test is $50. If you check your invoice, I think you will find that this procedure was not done. We make every effort to ensure that we follow the client's requests to the best of our ability. On Friday, your wife brought in 4 kittens for their first vaccinations and deworming. They each received a thorough physical exam, their first feline distemper vaccine, and a dose of dewormer. A 20% discount was applied to the vaccinations because you have 4 kittens. Your wife paid the entire bill at checkout. Angel was the receptionist that you spoke with on Thursday when you dropped off your cat for surgery as well as who you spoke to on the phone when you called back with concerns over the bill. Angel is one of our lead receptionists and does her very best to ensure that all of our clients are happy and their needs are met. Prior to this visit, you had not been in our office since 2016. Again, we are very sorry for any confusion and we wish you the best in finding future veterinary care. Sincerely, Dr. Lauren Ellenburg

name: Kileigh Bagwell
text: The best vet in town! The renovations are beautiful inside and out. Dr. Tom Ellenburg is very informative and caring.

name: joanna deatley
text: I absolutely love this clinic. I have used many vet clinics in the past but will never go anywhere else now. I have decided that even if I move I will still use this clinic. Dr. Mahan is phenomenal with my cats and remembers every detail about them each visit.  She always calls after visits and ensures that they're both doing well and to check if I need anything else for them.  The staff always remembers me when I come in for medication refills, to board the cats, or call with a question. I love the remodel and nee facilites now as well.

name: Joy Garner
text: I don't even now where to begin saying all I have experienced at this Vet hospital. ALL the staff and Vets are excellent! They have performed impossible surgeries on some of my animals that saved their lives. A local vet in the town I live in, performed a routine spay on my pet. The nightmare began. Her intestines ALL fell out on the floor. Westside performed emergency surgery and saved her life. I totally expected and was prepared for them to tell me she did not survive. I knew I was kissing her goodbye. No vet can top this team. I drive almost an hour one way to use this facility.

name: Michael Sypniewski
text: Best treatment you can buy for your loving pets in the area. Whenever it came to serious problems, this is the vet I came to. Best staff to deal with, period. They are a little pricey, but you get what you pay for here. They have the equipment that most don't have and they will go out of the way to find the issue. I had a doberman that got very sick and was having autoimmune problems. We had an issue finding out what was wrong and her not eating or drinking was making things worse. They had to keep her for a week and I was told that the techs actually went to a grocery store to buy sandwich meats just to try to get her to eat. All of the staff here are very caring and go above and beyond to care for their patients.

name: Carolyn J Bonin
text: I am a breeder with a large number of small dogs.  I spend a fair amount of time and a great deal of money at the vet.  Over the years I have used several very good vets in the area, but I am most happy with the care, the service and the prices at Westside Veterinary Hospital.  Whether it is routine screening or an emergency C-section at 4:00am, they never let me down.  I work mostly with Dr Dixie Mahan, but I also have a high regard for Dr Andy Wilkes and Dr Jarrod Harney.  The techs and the reception staff are also first rate.  All are knowledgeable, but also willing to listen.  Prices are always fair.  Good vet care is not inexpensive, but I never feel that money is the most important issue at Westside.  Their focus is invariably on providing the very best possible care for my dogs.

name: Tammy Kelley
text: Our family has been using Westside for decades and it's always a pleasant experience.  Everyone is always so kind and helpful.  Couldn't ask for better service.

name: Jonkristjen Eubanks
text: We would not take our pets any where else.  The staff are very courteous and we have always been pleased with the service.  Large or small, you can be sure your pet will not be just another patient, the WVH staff treat each pet as it is their own.

name: Marcia B
text: Everyone from the front desk back very helpful and friendly and go out of their way to make pets and "parents" feel comfortable and welcome.  Prices are reasonable and staff outstanding.

name: Ashley Green
text: We went on a week long vacation and boarded our very anxious puppy with them. They have made his anxiety worse by kicking the kennel doors closed on him because he was getting mad, we will never use this vet's office again. He is crate trained and house broken, so he should have been fine.

name: K McIntyre
text:
Take all my pets to Westside and have for over 10 years.    They have always treated them with love and care.

I was really impressed with the young Vet Tech who asked the same questions that Dr. Wilks did when he came into the room.  I don't remember her name but you obviously are on the right path

name: cindy lindsey
text: Always  kind, great  with both of our dogs

name: Ramona Mcmurray
text: I jus love Dr. Dixie an all the staff.you need a veterinarian ,then check out Westside veterinary hospital for all your pets.you will be glad you did.

name: Terri Needham
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital has the most loving, caring and understanding staff ever!!!! They have been my Vet for all my animals for years now, and I wouldn't have it any other way!! I panicked when my nosey little Lab got a fish hook stuck in her lip in the late evening, but one call to Westside and she was in the hospital, fish hook out, and I was assured she was fine!!! No more tears and Miss Dixie took such tender care of my nosey baby and me!!!!!! I would highly recommend Westside to anyone who loves their pets and wants the best care for them!!

name: Sandy Charest
text: I wouldn't take my dogs to another place.  They are the best.  One of the vets has even met me in the middle of the night during the power outages due to the 2011 tornadoes and saved my dog's life.

name: April Jones
text: They have taken really good care of my dogs. I would recommend them. My puppy was so sick then got an allergic reaction. They worked with us until we figured out the cause and they where very patient with us.

name: Janet Ricroft
text:
We have been using Westside for fifteen years now and I would not take my dogs anywhere else.  They have the best, most caring doctors I have had the pleasure to know.

Mostly I would like to thank Dr.  Dixie Mahan for being so caring to all my animals and very understanding of their humans.
J. Ricroft

name: Aaron Sumner
text: Westside has by far the best Staff and Vets.  They love the animals that are under their care, and are very empathetic to the humans as well.  They are well worth the drive from Huntsville!

name: Benny Pendergrass
text: they will take very good care of your animals and make sure you understand what you need to do to take care of them yourself when they leave there from their carrier and I also care about your animals that's hard to find

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: Love Westside Veterinary Hospital. We have taken all our pets there for the last 30 yrs. The staff is wonderful and so very helpful. Dr. Mahan and Dr. Ellenberg have always gone above and beyond for us.

name: Thomas Reese
text:
We have been going to this vet for years after leaving Huntsville. Our family has adopted many cats and dogs that wandered in to our lives over time. They have  always treated our pets as if they were a part of  their own family. The staff even calls to check up on them days after the visit. They have fair rates and don't put your pet thru expensive tests that often aren't neccesary. They.always inform you of all the treatment options that are available and let you decide.
They seem to be busy at times and they are growing. It's a smart idea to call first but even if you don't they always get you without much wait.

name: Jacob Bittle
text: We would like to publicly  thank and applaud this vet , especially dr dixie, for their excellent car of our dog rocker. Their ability and willingness to explain the how and why was fantastic. We plan to use them for all of our future pet needs.

name: Fred Hoffman
text: Thay have been great with our cat Samantha who passed on at 21 years, and with our dog Zack currently. We highly recommend them.

name: Holly Andries
text: They have always been there to help whenever I need them.  Always professional and curious.

name: Tom Dewille
text: I have a LARGE dog, the doctor (Harris)  came out to the car to  treat him instead of making me bring him in.  The service is spectacular and very competent.   It's a 45 min drive from my house and worth it.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Dewille, for your kind words.  We appreciate your business!

name: David Dreitzler
text:
I have used the services of WVC for years.  They are professional and caring.  It is a great animal hospital.

Dave Dreitzler

name: andrea taylor
text: My Callie had a medical emergency on Thanksgiving Day 2016....Dr. Ellenburg met us at the office at 4pm and gave her excellent care and she is now happier and healthy!!!....The staff and Drs at this office are FANTASTIC!!

name: Poison Apple
text: Westside Vet Clinic is the best , I could not ask for better in the care of my pets , Patient , kind and loving ,Tom Ellenberg , Dr Wilks and the rest of the staff are knowledgeable and up to date on the newest medical procedures , medicine and preventive care and through in questions on medical issues , i have one pet that gets very nervous when we are called back to a room , Dr Wilks and Vet techs Rita and or Jess will take the time to calm him down and no mussel is needed , All the staff at Westside is awesome !! i will never go anywhere else !!

resp.text: Ms. Saint, thank you so much for your sweet comment! We really appreciate your business.

name: P. Lyons
text:
We love Dr. Mahan, she always returns calls at the end of the day, even if its after business hours and that means a lot to us.  The staff is friendly, clean rooms, prompt appointments.

The Lyons family, Arab.

name: Nancy Lockhart
text: Excellent care, just had two dogs spayed and they are doing great.

name: Debi Blackmon
text: Terribly expensive.  The same treatment and meds at 3 other comparable vets in the area are way more than half of what they charge.  We did not get a diagnosis/cure there either.  Just bandaids.

name: Jessica Ross
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital is the greatest vet I have ever been too, My Gizzmo got his eye knocked out by another dog and Mr Tom Ellenburg made sure we got took care of at 11:00 pm one night because all the vets around me would not see us. So now this is the only vet I use, Thank ya'll very much.

name: Liz Hardy
text: Dr. Mahan is the best veterinarian we've ever had.

name: Stephanie Mier
text: We take all of our pets to Westside Vet.  They have always taken really good care of our fur babies.  And our larger livestock too when we had them.

name: Steve Collins
text: What a great staff. They are pros all the way. Very respectfull

name: Dena Bedsole
text: Dr. Wilks is always thorough and great with my animals!

name: Beth Riley
text: In all my years of having dogs, this is the best Veterinary Clinic I have ever been to. The most knowledgeable, caring, loving doctors and staff ... they are the BEST !!

name: Dennis Buckmeir
text: Westside is the best friend Benji and Milo have.

name: Ronnie Hornsby
text: Great place to take your pet.

name: Greg S
text: They are by far the VERY BEST veterinary facility we've ever used!

name: valerie ball
text: Friendly staff, quick service, and affordable

name: Dawn Dyar (makeuplady)
text: Wonderful caring doctors.

name: Renee Eiland
text: They do it for the pet's not the money, my babies love their Dr.

name: Darlene Evans
text: Couldn't ask for better Dr's or staff, my bella luvs luvs to go up there..

name: Ellen Burdick
text: We trust them 100% with our fur babies!

name: Mark Coombe
text: Amazing vet! My dog is very nervous at any vet and the vet made sure to spend extra time with her so our pupper would be more comfortable.

name: Andrew Johnson
text: Called to ask about a visit and was responded to very rudely

resp.text:
Dear Mr Johnson,
I’m so sorry about your bad experience. If you could let me know the approximate time this occurred it will narrow down who I need to speak with.
Thank you, Dr Beth

name: Katie Lynn Carpenter
text: I took my cat there because she was limping really badly one morning. The staff was pretty nice however, the Vet they have there is a complete idiot. She basically told me nothing, gave me some pain killers to give her, an expensive bill to pay and sent me home. She said that my cat may have been bitten but that she had too much fur too tell. I ended up taking my cat to another vet the next day, this vet looked at her, felt her leg and instantly found a huge hole on her leg, the size of a pencil eraser. I don't know why this doctor couldn't find that hole or shave her leg to find the hole, but she is just awful and should be fired.

name: Amanda McGough
text: We trust Dr. Johnston and his staff with all of our fur babies and are so thankful to have them close to home. Dr. Johnston goes beyond most and takes the time to explain and educate clients. He is fair and just in his pricing and does not perform unnecessary tests/procedures. Dr. Johnston is a caring human being who will treat your pets as if they were his own. I strongly admire his love and passion for animals and am very happy we chose his hospital. You will be too.

name: Kat Paay
text: Absolutely wonderful vet. All of my dogs go here and will for the rest of my life. Doc is absolutely wonderful and treats the animals with the compassion and respect that they deserve. He is a no nonsense kind of guy that will tell you like it is and get your fur babies feeling better in no time

name: Curtis Bush
text: Very caring and knowledgable!  Had my Katybug up and going in no time.

name: Cody Burgamy
text: I very highly recommended that you DO NOT use Pike Animal Hospital. This disrespectful vet had our Lab, who had been our family pet for 12 years, for the entire day. Somehow between keeping our dog for 8 hours, charging us 400$ just for bloodwork and X-rays, he failed to notice the 5 pound tumor on our dogs spleen. The tumor caused our dogs spleen to rupture in which we took to another vet in town, who was amazing and their entire staff treated us with the upmost respect and professionalism. They had to do emergency surgery for which our pup didn’t make it. Aside from overcharging us, and missing the key diagnoses for the situation, he was extremely disrespectful and unprofessional to my wife and I. His passive aggressive, sarcastic remarks all of which regarding money, were almost overwhelming. Not to mention that he didn’t even send any meds home with us to help my dog. Neither myself nor anyone I know in our community will be using this vet ever again. He really needs to do some self reflection and learn how to be respectful and professional all the way around.

resp.text:
Mr. Burgamy,
We were perplexed by your scathing review because as you left our office on Monday, Nov. 30th you thanked us repeatedly for all we had done and assured Dr. Johnston and the rest of the staff that Cooper would be returning the next day for the free treatment that had been offered. We were even more surprised by the hostile text from your father that was sent to Dr. Johnston after hours. Thankfully, your father was willing to answer our phone calls and understood our position. It has come to my attention that you may have heard a briefing between the vet and staff, which is often much blunter than the conversation between a vet and the client by necessity. Unfortunately, I believe that this misunderstanding may be the source of this perplexing review. Our staff would never speak to a client in the same manner as they do to each other as we understand that clients do not handle these situations on a regular basis. All conversation that has taken place between you and the staff at Pike Animal has been compassionate and courteous up to this point.
I would like to assure you that our staff does not bring up money unless asked to do so by the client. We did everything in our power to help you and Cooper. I would like to remind you that we did not only offer ICU care for Cooper, which was declined, we also offered 7 days of free out-patient treatment which was also declined. We highly doubt that your other vet offered any free treatment for Cooper.
In veterinary medicine, there are many variables. Cooper presented as a 12-year-old Lab who could not walk; therefore, we were searching for hip dysplasia. Dr. Johnston informed you gently that as we ran more tests more health issues would be found due to Cooper’s age and pre-existing health conditions. Once initial diagnostic testing had been run, Dr. Johnston did inform you that Cooper’s prognosis for recovery was poor. Pike Animal Hospital and Dr. Johnston do not make these calls lightly and run every diagnostic test necessary before coming to this kind of conclusion.
Our heart goes out to you for the loss of your beloved pet. It is unfortunate that you cannot find it in your heart to see things clearly at this time and have chosen to accuse Pike Animal Hospital of any form of neglect or misdiagnoses when so much was offered to you in kindness. We have attempted to reach out and extend our condolences as well as hear your feedback and try to put to rest any miscommunications, however, we have been met with no response. It is regrettable that you misunderstand the situation and this review is all the more disappointing. Each case presented to us is different and as such we must customize treatment accordingly, which we attempted to do for Cooper and would have been able to do better had he returned for further treatment. Please bear in mind that Pike Animal Hospital did everything we could for Cooper. Cooper was a fine dog who the staff here at Pike Animal Hospital, especially Dr. Johnston, grew to love in his short time here. We would like to offer our condolences and hope that you will be grateful for the love and memories Cooper bestowed instead of looking for someone to blame for his loss.

name: Fat Antobelly
text: Best vet I have ever met. He is honest, passionate, and excellent at his craft. Very straightforward and won’t BS you. I know he and the staff are going to put the health of the animal above everything else. Much thanks to all of the staff at Pike Animal Hospital. Only place I’ll ever take my pets.

name: Brandon Grantham
text: I have been Amazed by Dr. Johnston. I’ve never had a vet like Dr. Johnston. He is the most caring Vet that I know and you can see that whenever you talk to him. He loves the animals and treats them as his own. The staff is the best staff I have ever encountered every time I’ve ever needed something they answer my call and are the most polite and kind. They will adjust to your wants whenever you ASK. My last pet to bring them was my female cat who was urinating blood. From the first minute on, Dr. Johnston was completely honest and upfront about her diagnosis. He tried the least invasive treatment first Antibiotics. Which we did for about a month. Me and my Fiancé  thought they worked at different points and eventually we had to have surgery. In 30 YEARS of being a vet he has never done surgery on a female cat with kidney stones. Before her surgery he did not know what she had and told us that it could be a tumor or kidney stone we just didn’t know but he narrowed it down to the 2. Dr. Johnston was truly over the top in his care of our baby who’s surgery was a great Success!!! Removal of 2 Kidney stones.  He treats your baby as his own by not doing extra procedures like sending off blood for testing because he knows treatment is expensive. If needed he will do whatever is necessary because he treats them as his own!!

name: Jonah Magnus Hate Account
text: Absolutely phenomenal. Was an emergency visit. My dog was hit by a car and the Dr and staff were awesome with him. Very professional and caring st the same time. Will recommend to anyone I see. Will also be changing vets for my other dogs.

name: Joshua Whitson
text: They treated our little puppy like their own.  Took him there for parvo.  They saved the little guy.  Now if we have to board him we go there.  The puppy gets excited if you mention the vet or the names of the people that work there.  Highly recommended

name: Laura Dove
text:
Dr. Johnston and his team are absolutely wonderful. They have been caring for my dogs for the last six years and we board our dogs with them when we go out of town. Everyone there genuinely loves the animals they see. They are also very accessible in emergencies. I have had to reach out to Dr. Johnston on a Sunday before, and he returned my call within an hour.

One of my dogs became ill, and Dr. Johnston did everything he could, but we sadly ended up having to make the decision to put him to sleep last year. It was a horrible thing to go through, but because we had been working with Dr. Johnston, I at least had the confidence that it was the right decision. When it was time, the support I got from everyone there was unbelievable. It was comforting to be surrounded by people who truly knew and loved my dog.

name: Hannah Styron
text: I honestly could not say enough great things about the staff at Pike Animal Hospital! From the moment we walked through the door they were so friendly. Our sweet baby had to unexpectedly stay the weekend with them. Every time I called they ensured me that I wasn't bothering them and gave her the best care while she was there. Even after bringing her home they were so friendly when I called with questions. I would so highly recommend them.

name: Andrew “Foster” Reeves
text: Great vet! They have always treated my dog like she was one of their pets.

name: Audra Weaver
text: I used to work here, but even before and after, I still take my pets here. Dr. Johnston loves his animals, his staff, and what they do. He will do everything he can to help you and your furry friends. No large animal practice. Emergency services. Boarding services with great kennels and yards.

name: Laura Thompson
text: The nicest & most honest people. They actually care about you & your precious babies! Always been so hopefully! Thank you for caring about ME!

name: Jordan Sutton
text: Absolutely love Dr. Johnson! Has such a heart for animals. I've been bringing my fur baby here and he's always so sympathetic and compassionate towards even the smallest problem we've had. Tells you just how it is and is very eager to work with you. Staff loves the animals and I've always felt very comfortable leaving my cat over night because I know they go in and check on her and take care of her and even update me on her conditions. Very reasonable prices! Best place in troy to go!

name: Stephanie Caldwell
text: Our dog got attacked and Dr. Johnston and his staff were absolutely wonderful with him. After weeks of stitches,surgery,and being in doggy ICU, We finally got to bring Stinky home!!

name: tori mcquagge
text: Best vet around! Our dog ripped her stitches tonight and we met Dr. Johnston within 30 minutes he made sure she was all good! Definitely recommend him!!!!

name: Jason Sulliman
text:
I am not sure what was more frustrating. It might be that time our cat was attacked by a dog so we called their emergency line and never received a call back (we found another animal hospital- unfortunately our cat did not survive).

Then again, it might be the reminder we got in the mail 6 months later about his vaccinations. But when I think about it, I think the most frustrating part was speaking to their employee about the incident. They were very sorry about mailing the reminder. Completely missed the point...

I'm sure they are fine for basic services etc. and many people seem to be happy with them. But for me, the time I really needed them they were not helpful and it was completely mishandled. I get that our pet's death is not their fault per say, but I will never take my animals to them again.

name: Robyn E
text:
Unfortunately, I lost 2 pets in their care. I lost a Toy Poodle that I was told had pyometra and needed to be spayed immediately. I took her in and she was extremely sick. I went to visit her, and they had her in the boarding runs, surrounded by barking dogs. I asked for her to be moved to a more quiet place, so they moved her to the cat room. A couple of days later, I came to visit her again, and they had her in a "parvo" kennel that was being used for storage. She died shortly after that visit.

A couple of years later, I brought a Heeler in because she was throwing up. Same scenario--pyometra. They spayed her and her health continued to decline. After a few days, she was stable enough to come home. When my husband got there to pick her up, Dr Johnston said she "crashed" when he took her IV out. A couple of days later, the doctor recommended that we euthanize her.

I came in to pay my $1200 bill and pick up my dog's ashes,  and the doctor didn't even bother to talk to me. The young man at the desk apologized and hugged me. Then he handed me a stained pillowcase with a plastic bag full of ashes. I couldn't even get a list of procedures that they did on my Heeler.

It has taken me a long time to be able to write this review. Look around the clinic when you go in. There are used needles laying on counters and the place needs to be deep cleaned. The exam rooms are full of junk, so he uses the exam table in the middle, where the public has no business going.

I've been to a lot of vet clinics, and have worked at a couple. This one is sad.  Yes, Dr Johnston is nice, but that only goes so far.

resp.text:
Hi Robyn, first I would like to say we are so sorry for your loss. Since you have chosen to remain anonymous and this event occurred years ago, I have little recollection of the specific details. I do, however, remember you said you previously worked in vet clinics before. You were shown that my equipment is constantly upgraded and all approved treatment protocols were followed. You must still be grieving to write a scathing one star review so long after the event occurred. My heart goes out to you. I would have met you at the door with your ashes had I known you were here.
I am also very sorry that you did not have your dogs spayed. That would have prevented the deadly pyometra, not the lack of a "deep cleaning" which all but brand new clinics require. To ensure transparency, we do encourage clients to watch us work on their pets in our treatment area. All treatment areas have surgical instruments and needles in them. If a client does not care to watch, they always have the option to wait in the lobby. Since the time of your visit we have an entire new staff. I have shown them your review in an effort to reemphasize the importance of client communication, compassion, cleanliness, and grief management. Sometimes during upgrades to our facility, we regrettably must utilizes all the storage space including the exam room and isolation ward. Sounds like you caught us at a very busy time and we made some mistakes in those areas, but unfortunately those things could not have prevented the tragic outcome. All animals I see get the best care I can provide. Tragically, they do not all survive and I have as much trouble accepting that as you  do.
I have been practicing for 30 years now. Losing a patient gets hard every year. Online reviews are new to me. I take them all personally and would much rather speak in person. I am very accepting and open to constructive criticism.  As you can tell by the vast majority of my reviews, that my cherished clients are pleased. I know it is impossible to please everyone and save every pet, but I do try my hardest. It breaks my heart to know how you must feel to write this review after a loss so long ago. Again, I am sincerely sorry you are still grieving and I am hurting too.
My very best regards.

name: Matt Ezell
text:
My wife and I have been bringing our dogs here for years.  When we lived in Troy, we wrestled for years trying to find a vet we were truly comfortable with...  After being recommended here by friends, we have never looked again.  The people here not only do this for a 'job', but they do this because it is important to them and because they truly care for our animals...

Since, we have moved nearly 3 hours away from Troy, but still often drive our dogs back down for their shots and checkups when we can just because we love the care and value of the Pike Animal Hospital.

name: Theresa Frakes
text: Dr. Johnston is dedicated to his patients and treats each animal as if it were his own!

name: Jeff H (Tandom)
text: Just started taking my dog here after trying out a few of the other places. Johnson is a good vet who tells you like it is. He takes care your dog like one of his.

name: Amy Copeland
text: Wonderful place for your pets. Excellent care and compassion.

name: Vickie Roberts
text: Wonderful clinic to work with.

name: Ronda M
text: I have to give them a 5 star.  A friends baby boy Louie became very ill, due to being bit.  They weren't sure at first what had bitten him.  He didn't get any better with the treatment he was receiving so, they started an antivenom thinking that maybe he was bitten by a baby snake.  He has started to improve, but has a long road to recover.  Robin is extremely grateful for all that they are doing for Louie....  Thank you for all your care.

name: Rebecca Walters
text: The employees and doc says very friendly

name: Latasha Smith
text: Lost my dear Della but the vet and his staff was very compassionate towards my family thank you so much

name: Angel Tillery
text: Biggest, bestest heart! Such caring staff.

name: kevin heil
text:
I'm a truck driver who takes my dog everywhere i go.
Dr Johnson is a very good at what he does and will take care of your pet without unnecessary and expensive treatments.
I really thought the week of April 1st my dog got very sick on the road she wasn't looking good i thought i was going to lose her when we arrived back home.
She was treated and found out just bad allergies.
I can't thank him enough for what they do there at Pike Animal Hospital i have been there for as long as i can remember.
Agian THANK YOU ALL for all you did for my baby she is trucking again and healthy as a 10 year trucker can be.

name: Cathy Engwall
text: Great place, everyone is wonderful and will answer any questions that you might have !

name: tr3b0r85
text: They know me and my pets. If I bump into them away from the office they still inquire about how they are.

name: April Mooney
text: I will not ever take my animal to this vet ever again.  My regerstered service dog had been possessed and about dead.  We sat in their office for an hour and he had a accident in the waiting room they told us to get that thing outside and for us to find another vet.  Far worning people u may wanna find another vet to go to instead of this one. If you go to this one your little one may die.

name: Alice Jones
text: There great

name: Robin palisades
text: Saved my dogs life....

name: Christine Henley
text: I am glad I did not read the negative reviews before I went, I probably would not have gone! This place is AMAZING!! From the moment I walked in EVERYONE from Dr. Hinton  to the staff were so nice, caring and considerate! They took Trixie back as soon as I walked in. I had called ahead of time. It was 11:30 pm on Christmas day 2018 when vets are closed. Including ones that are listed on Google that say Emergency. I guess it is only for emergencies that happen during business hours only!  BUT NOT HERE!!! . At ER Specialty Animal Medical Center there is ALWAYS someone there to help when no other vet is!! Be assured they are there to help your baby!! I had ( keyword had ) a vet for 25 years or more that I kept telling them something was wrong. I kept asking questions wanting answers! We tend to know when things go wrong with our babies  or when something just isn't right but I kept getting told by my regular vet " she is just old " . Well it was more than just old!! She should NOT have had to suffer like she did for as long as she did!! A year!! My mistake was trusting my vet and not trusting my gut instinct and taking her here a long time ago !  IF ever you need a GREAT doctor who is knowledgeable and caring or if you have a gut feeling something is wrong and you do not get the right answer from your regular vet THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO DO NOT DO AS I DID JUST GO!! I appreciate EVERYONE who tried to save my baby girl Trixie!   Thank you ALL for making a very hard and painful situation a little easier and giving me the truth so that my baby did not have to suffer anymore! Believe me I will be back to have my other baby Zeno who is also 15 years old checked out because I know you all are the best! They have more equipment than most vets! I see many negative comments about price. All I can say is I have paid way more to save a my baby only to be told after wards that I need to put him to sleep which then added more cost!! These people care about your baby not money! It is my vet of over 25 years who is in it for the money! My heart is shattered to pieces but I know my baby is no longer suffering! Dr. Hinton explained every thing and answer all my questions no matter how many or how long it took!, They do not rush me into anything! Thank you does not seem like enough! I appreciate you all more than I could express or than you know!  Love you all! Thanks again! ((HUGS))

name: Rachel Tucker
text:
Many thanks to Dr. Birk and Carl. They were amazing with my greyhound, Maybelle. Her lip was torn late this afternoon (Sunday) when she got into a tiff with another dog while playing. Dr. Birk did a thorough exam and then perfectly stapled the area closed, all without sedation. This is no small accomplishment because Maybelle has limited patience when she's uncomfortable.
Everyone was so nice, from my initial phone call to the end of the appointment. They were clear about pricing from the beginning and I left with all my questions answered. Our time was managed well, too. It only took about an hour from arrival to departure.

Bonus: She was prescribed a half tablet of an anti-inflammatory twice a day. I just gave her her first dose and found that they split all the tablets for me! Now I don't have to dig for a pill cutter in my kitchen.

You guys could not have done anything better. A solid five stars earned. Maybelle is comfortable now, enjoying a post-dinner nap on her bed as I type this.

name: Bayron Baggett
text: Horrible place to take a pet. We had one vet there care more about his little airplane that he didn’t take care of his patients and another vet that performed surgery without our permission after he found out he couldn’t get all of a cancerous tumor. He just made our dog suffer for some money. There are two other 24hrs vets that have opened that look like the reviews are much better. Primarily b/c of this Emergency Vet. If you really need the best, Auburn Univ. Emergency Vet was incredible.

name: Mike Barker
text: Our beloved dog of 18 years was dying in the middle of the night of old age and we contacted this clinic at 1:30 am. They were immediately caring and sympathetic on the phone and when we arrived at the clinic. They quickly walked us through the process while being very sensitive to our emotions. A big thank you to the night shift staff for taking such good care of our dog and us!

name: Wendy Plash
text: All about money. Stay away. Staff is extremely rude and and uncaring. Long wait when there isn't even anyone else there. Ran tests even though I stated to call first. Beware they are moving to 280 and changing their name. Not surprised. All the other bad reviews are just like I experienced. The same horrible female ER doctor is still with them. Please take your pet somewhere else!!!

name: Breck Hennessy
text: We had a scare with our small dog around 10pm and we took her here because they were open and our vet was not. It was so comforting to know she was in good hands all night staying hydrated until we could get her to our normal vet. It is pretty expensive and the wait was a little long, but overall I think our dog got good care and the staff was informative and friendly.

name: Stacie Irwin
text: The facilities are clean and easy to find.  They did everything they could for our dog.  It is regrettable that the costs are as high as they are, but having paid for emergency medical care for humans, I have no doubt they have little control over their prices.  They communicated procedures and prices to us carefully and thoroughly before they performed them.  The staff was professional, knowledgeable, and compassionate with us in a difficult time.

name: Jeremiah Blackmon
text: Terrible experience.  We called 5x before successfully getting an update on our dog’s medical status.    They didn’t provide any instructions on food or medical diagnosis when we picked up our schnauzer.   We immediately took him to our Primary vet....thankfully they now have him on the mend.

name: Chris Turner
text:
These folks are as good as it gets. My first experience with the staff was 4 years ago when our boxer, Lucy, suddenly seized. They were extremely caring and efficient.
Last weekend, my wife found a lost and starving dog near her office. With our regular vet closed, she took the dog here. Despite being so busy, they took the dog in, checked her out, and contacted the owner that had her chipped. The owner had given the dog away, but gave contact info. These folks tried to reach the owners and kept, fed, and cared for the dog for 3 days, though they were busy as heck. They even all owed us to visit the dog when they weren't completely tied up.
Ultimately, the owners never returned calls and despite posting the found dog on social media and all of the lost dog websites, we never found the owner family.
They released the dog into our care so that we could continue looking for the owners.
These folks are awesome!

name: Jeremy Grindle
text: We had to have our 13 y/o put to sleep this morning and this was the only place open today. The staff and Dr were very sympathetic and professional to my wife, children, and myself. The Dr reassured me after looking at her that I had made the right decision. A very hard but the right decision! Thank you guys so very much for helping us with our beloved pet!

name: Robert Cerfolio
text: Our beloved 15 year-old golden retriever Sugar - finally came to the end of her long life after she developed acute pain. The staff and MD at 3 AM in the morning were kind, caring and gracious and put her to eternal sleep with love. As a surgeon who deals with end-of life issues, I can say that they made a difficult emotional family experince as positive as possible.

name: Theresa Williams
text: We took our 15 year old golden in due to nasal bleeding. We saw Dr. David Dismukes. He was thorough and honest with what we would be facing including treatment options. I completely trust we made the correct decision based on this diagnosis.

name: Mrs. Anderson
text: They saved our dog from intestinal cancer.  I had a great experience with the emergency vet, the surgeon and the internist.  Yes, it's expensive.  Yes, in the middle of the night or on the weekend, they might be very busy, but they gave our sweet girl wonderful care and four months later, it's like it never happened.  I really can't believe our dog is still alive but I'm so happy she is!

name: Regina Kellenberger
text: I am grateful for the kindness they showed my dying cat.  They made the arrangements for her cremation.  They are amazing vets!

name: Megan Jones
text: Obviously atleast some of the good reviews are fake on here. They gave my dog pain medicine that the next day she still can barely move. I have to hold her up so she can drink water then she collapses back down. Opened her two prescriptions today and the bottles were switched - could be dangerous!  I only noticed because the dosage didn't make sense.  After googling what the pills look like I confirmed they put wrong prescriptions in wrong bottles!   If you go here, make sure you read paperwork.  Wasn't aware the # they gave me was an estimate which they should tell you and not just have it in tiny writing! When I went to pay the price had jumped a good bit.  People are pretty rude here too and the wait is long.  If I could have waited to go to my regular vet I would have because they're much quicker and nicer and don't just want your money.

name: Brian W. Kittrell
text: I have had to come here a couple of times with a couple of different pets. Each time it was because it was my only option. The pricing is extremely high and I do get the distinct feeling that that this is a money generating machine (with unnecessary, exorbitantly-priced tests) rather than a caring clinic. The waits do seem a bit long. The staff is friendly but they could do a much better job with communication.

name: Erin Walton
text:
Our dog spent the night vomiting, so we brought him in. We were at the clinic 3.5 hours start to finish. The ladies at the front desk were friendly and helpful. We had a lot of waiting time between staff seeing us. We had three vet techs and the vet, so we kept seeing new people without introductions. We were displeased with Dr. Shuessler. She seemed tired, irritated, and did not show the friendliness or compassion you'd expect from a vet. (Especially at an emergency center.)

We were recommended an overnight stay with IV to monitor our dog, which would estimate $600. He hadn't thrown up since we arrived, so we decided to decline. We received an outpatient estimate, and we declined one of the procedures, to which a tech seemed slightly frustrated that a new estimate would have to be written up. Overall, it was unfriendly service, a lot of waiting time, and expensive. We will look elsewhere for weekend/emergency care in the future.

name: Kaylee Frankhouse
text: just recently took my puppy here. spent lots of money and felt very confused. after a stressful day of not knowing if he needs surgery I go to pick him up and the first thing the lady told me was he needed training and begins complaining about the trouble my dog gave them. I don’t know why any of them (aside from ONE friendly person there) work where they do. I’ve never left a review for a business but as a young (and very broke) adult, I do not want anyone else to make the mistake I did coming here. I would not recommend spending your money here unless is the only option available.

name: Charles Shirah
text:
Our dog had a serious reaction to something, and of course it was on Sunday evening, when her regular clinic was closed. We were promptly seen by obviously caring folks who kept us informed constantly on what was being done. Dr. Schuessler and all of the staff were very attentive and thorough. They took plenty of time to discuss the treatment and kept us only long enough to make sure her condition was resolved. I thought the charges were very fair and well explained.
I am glad we have a facility that is available for emergencies for the four legged part of our family.

name: Christy Holt
text: PLEASE READ ALL THE WAY TO THE END IF YOU VALUE YOUR PETS LIFE!  Last night I called ahead to let them know we were bringing in a critical older dog who had been in a dog fight, had extreme blood loss and  was in severe shock.  We had been gone for the day so didn’t know exactly when the fight happened.  Right from our arrival, I had to ask for help to get him out of the car.  They wouldn’t even do that until we checked in and they got a copy of drivers license.  The “Dr” didn’t introduce us.  She unwrapped him and tried to make him stand.  She said he was too far gone and offered to put him down.  Didn’t even want to treat him! Upon insisting she finally gave us an estimate for over night treatment... over $1000. And wouldn’t start treatment until they received payment.  3 hours later we made the decision to put him out of his pain while we were there to give him comfort as he passed in stead of locking him in a kennel to wait and see if he survived the night.  Dr put him down (3re dog that night) while we were mourning his passing she went back to her desk sat her fat butt down and continued to stuff her face, calling her 2 nasty looking little dogs over and fed them scraps all right there in the room with us and our dead dog.  Never use this clinic!  They do not care about your pet nor your feelings!  They only want your money!  Please find another ER!  There are several in the Birmingham area!

name: Bham Bio
text: Took our puppy here around 11:30pm the women that work the front desk were very sweet and understanding, it didn’t take long to get back and see the Doctor which was nice, He was very explanatory and took very good care of our dog and let us know step by step what they were doing and how to continue treatment. All in all it was a very nice experience.

name: Amanda Denaburg
text: Thank you for your sensitivity, your kindness, and your professionalism this evening. Your team made one of the worst experiences as bearable as possible. Your compassion made a real difference.

name: S. Crawford
text:
Terrible experience. I regret ever coming here. The lack of empathy and/or compassion is embarrassingly evident and I feel ashamed for leaving my sweet cat here to suffer overnight.
