text: The entire staff is great! Oak View has taken care of our fur babies for a long time and I trust them to be caring and professional

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Dr. Robinson is the best!   My dog only “smiles” at 4 people and she’s one of them. Even though my dog received a shot and dye in her eye during her visit, she still loves her. I drive all the way from alabaster to Oak View because of how nice everyone treats my dogs.

name: Bailey Mills
text: I brought in my dog when I first got her. She was older and I didn’t know the kinda shape she was in. I had a lot of questions and concerns about taking care of her. The doctor helped me work it out and answered all of my questions. I felt more prepared to be a puppy parent after taking my dog to OakView. I was extremely pleased and will continue to take her there.

name: Brian J Less
text: This has been a staple in Pelham for years for veterinary care from back when Murphy was there to now. Great place!!!!

name: Queenmommy Murphy
text: We love everyone at Oak View. They genuinely care about their clients and pets.

name: Lyn Hughes
text: Great people, caring staff! Can’t imagine going elsewhere...

name: Sam Cook
text: First time wellness exam was free and they all enjoyed my dog. Gave me some recommendations for treating his separation anxiety as well.

name: Michael Rowland
text:
We love Dr Robinson
She’s so compassionate and I love that she personally calls to update us on our dog and also check in on our dog to make sure he is ok.

name: Chuck McBryde
text: I didn’t expect to be able to go back with my dog but I did get to and I think that was huge for him.

resp.text: Chuck, we are so happy to hear you had a positive experience with us! We loved meeting you and Cash!

name: Alexandra Smith
text: My big weim boy, Willie Nelson, had to spend a week here while we were in between selling our home and moving to another. Daphne, the kennel manager left a sweet note about Willie's stay and built a feeding system for him with the food we brought. Willie is usually a very inconsistent eater but it seems like he is going to stick to it now. Pricing is always great and fair... especially for the care given. Thank you Daphne and all the wonderful staff!

name: Melissa Paruszkiewicz
text: Dr. Robinson is the best! She always takes time to answer questions, and I don’t feel dumb or like I’m a bother to her.

name: Leigh Morgan
text: Love the staff at oak view! And they love my pups!

name: Jenny McCallum
text: Dr. Early and Julie are so wonderful kind, wonderful and gentle. They are both so welcoming to my dogs.  Julie knows how to make my skittish dog, Jackson, feel comfortable with lots of love and peanut butter! Oak View is so amazing, I am so glad I found them. I always feel heard and never rushed! Thank you for always caring for my fur babies!!

name: marsha bowers
text: I was very grateful that Dr. Whitfield was so patient with my incessant questioning.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Pebbles!

name: Phaedra Galloway
text: Dr Whitfield has cared for our pets for over 20 years. The other doctors and staff I’ve seen at Oak view have been excellent as well.

name: A Google User
text: Love these folks!!! Everyone is so nice and accommodating.  They give full attention to my dog's needs.  Highly recommend!!

name: melanie long
text: Dr Early is very sweet and relatable

name: Cami Velazquez
text: Oak View has been amazing to work with! Our puppy is always able to be seen in a timely manner, and they send helpful emails with reminders about health maintenance. They are always willing to answer all of our many questions and provide excellent care of our puppy! I would highly recommend Oak View to anyone in search of a vet!

name: Johnny Carmack
text: Prompt, professional personal touch.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this review! Thank you for trusting us with CiCi & Cookie's care!

name: Lisa Phipps
text: Staff is always kind. Never had to wait very long to be seen.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We really appreciate it!

name: Betsy Schmidt
text: I love Oak View! My family has been using them for years.

name: Cody C
text: The docs and staff here genuinely care.

name: Allen Goodwine
text: Whitfield is so caring.  Willing to take time to speak with us on phone.  Then staff so helpful and friendly.

name: Kelly Brennan
text: I brought in a rescue we named Roscoe. The staff we very professional, extremely sweet, but most important, loving and helpful to this amazing pup who unexpectedly made his way into our lives. They went above and beyond what they needed to in order to make sure he is healthy! They answered all my questions thoroughly and took their time, even though we were the last appointment (that we were able to book right before lunch) of the day (on a Monday at that!). They even made him a goody bag with treats, doggy bags, and a toy for him!! Outstanding care. Kudos to this practice!

name: Debra Milton
text: Everyone was terrific, my sheltie warmed up to the Vet and staff (which he NEVER does) immediately that in itself made me comfortable.  Kudos to the groomer she did an awesome job with our sheltie.  Thanks, everyone.  Debra Milton

name: Butch Burbage
text: I am a long time patron of Oak View. I have always received first class service from both doctors and techs every time I’ve been in. I trust them completely with all of our pets. I wholeheartedly recommend you use this facility for all of your pet needs. On this particular visit, they were able to see my dog Izzy right away for a concern I had. Everything turned out great! Thank you so very much for your care and treatment of Izzy.

name: Bruce Bursi
text: Always kind to my super anxious dog and so nice to deal with.

name: Carolyn S Harrison
text: The staff were kind and professional, as was Dr. Early. They all clearly care a great deal for animals. The price was comparable to other animal clinics. This was our first visit, since moving here from Montgomery. I am so thrilled that we have found a good veterinarian were we live now.

name: Jan Bailey
text:
We have been going to Oak View for 10 years at least. Love the staff and Dr.'s, they are all very helpful and caring.
Had dental work done today, several teeth pulled. Dr. called me after procedure and let me know what all they had to do and assured me my Maya was doing well. Love this place.

Jan Bailey

name: John McQueen
text: Exceptionally great group of Veterinarian doctors that really care for your pets!

name: Kim Downs
text: Our first visit was on Wed and I really liked Dr. Early. Even with Covid restrictions, I felt like she took the time to answer all my questions and make suggestions to help me properly care for Shelby!

name: haley arnott
text:
this was my first time coming here with my dog and they were absolutely amazing!! so friendly, not overly priced at all.. my dog absolutely loved it and she came home so happy.
very, very professional.. i’m going to start coming there regularly.
thank you to everyone for taking care of my sweet pup today!

name: Robert Milstead
text: Outstanding Pet Care Family!

name: Thomas Brown
text: Kristen did a fantastic job!  Best haircut Duchess has had in a long time!

name: Cam AP
text: Vets here are friendly, reasonable prices also

name: Anna Strutzenberg
text: They allowed animal control to take a friends dog away by animal control and then be euthanized. She called multiple times per week to check on her fur baby to make sure he was safe. They lied to her throughout those weeks knowing full and well what they had done.

name: Linda Lemoine
text: I was very pleased with my cat grooming experience. My cat is Phoebe and she had an appointment on 08-14.

name: Lorena Juarez
text: I just adopted two Pomeranians and I decided to take them to Oak View Animal Hospital for a check up. I was surprised of how professional they were and I really liked how they explained everything they did. I highly recommend them.

name: Amanda Dinsmore
text: Dr. Robinson feels like part of our family- she certainly takes care of our four-legged babies.

name: Dan Mabie
text:
Oakview is a truly excellent clinic. We've received some of the best medical care imaginable from Dr. Robinson and Dr. Early, as well as all the staff. They helped treat our dog through chemo, and made it a bearable experience for our corgi, but they also gave us all the options and kept us on the right track throughout the whole process, making sure that we were considering the health and happiness of our pet first and not pushing us to any decision.

We drive an extra 30 minutes to go to Oakview and are happy to do it every time.

name: Patrick J Henry
text: We were attended to right away, given medicine for the dog, and as usual, everything went find.

name: Bryant Cline
text: Excellent communication. Great customer service with a smile.

name: ellana lecroy
text: Dr Whitfield and staff ROCKS❤

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We love getting to see Roxy Tutu!

name: Clif Render
text: We love the staff at Oak View and the care and kindness that they have consistently shown to me and my family members (both the furry ones and the non-furry ones, too)! They've seen us through fostering, adopting, and navigating the painful process of terminal cancer. They've become a part of our extended family and I recommend that you consider making them a part of yours as well.

name: D Thompson
text: My experience with Oak View has not been very good since Dr. Whitfield left.  The techs  are very courteous and helpful but the new young vets lack the experience, knowledge, and compassion that is needed for our furry family members.

name: Nelson Bates
text: Update: The vet techs lied to me. They euthanized our dog without a court order and so much as a phone call. I gained this information from the Manager of the city of pPelham. We boarded our dog with this clinic on June 1, 2020. We are homeless because of covid. My wife has contacted them several times checking on him and discussed services that they offer. We got a coupon via PetSmart and Shelby humane to have him neutered in Irondale. When we went to get our dog the clinic had adopted him out. Instead of being professional and admitting their mistake and helping us to bing our family member home they blamed my wife. They said that they attempted to contact us. They did not. Because we refused the $475 quote does not mean we care any less for our animal. His name is Axle And is a blonde Rot/Lab mix. He had to have been adopted the last 3 days because she had just declined their over priced  neuter service. We went to bring him home today and they said he had been adopted. They hung up on us numerous times and failed to provide any help. We want our dog.

name: Molly Bennett
text: My first experience taking my pet to Oak View was wonderful.  Caring staff, great hours, perfect location.  Dr. Elizabeth Robinson is the best!  I highly recommend them.

name: becky filler
text: Lee is awesome, she works front desk and always tries to help. Dr. Robinson is so great with my Boston terrier Charlie. You can tell he feels loved. He is always happy to go to the vet.

name: Linda Hall
text: I am from out of state and everyone at the office, the receptionist, the vet techs, and the Dr. were so kind and caring towards me and my sick kitty. They were able to get me in on a Saturday morning for which I am so grateful .

name: Noah Mitchell
text: The Dr’s And staff are all amazing and great people and provide great service for your pets. They always take care of any concerns I have and follow up with phone calls after the visit to make sure everything is good.

resp.text: Noah - Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View Animal Hospital.  Glad we are able to provide you peace of mind and give you the answers you need and deserve. We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners and are thankful for the kind words & feedback.

name: KD Burchfield
text: The staff and docs at Oak View are amazing! They are always so kind, ready to help, and appointments are on time and thorough. They are gentle and understanding with animals, prices are very reasonable too. They have been taking care of my little @chica.lulu for 6 years and now our newest addition, 14yo Nacho. We HIGHLY recommend them!

resp.text: KD - We appreciate you recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Rebecca Davis McClard
text: The entire staff is very kind and professional. You can tell that they love the animals as much as the owners. I am embarressed to say I do not recall the name of the young lady who assisted Dr. Robinson with my kitten Myth, but she was very sweet, very informative, and over all very gentle with Myth (plus I think he liked her and that is always a sign of a good person to me). Dr. Robinson was cheerful, informative, and takes the care of her patients seriously and for that I am very thrilled to have her as the vet for my cats.

resp.text: Rebecca Welcome to our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for the feedback & taking the time to share your thoughts. We look forward to being your partners in your cat's health.

name: Heather Ramsey
text: The people at Oak View are wonderful. They have loved and cared for my dog for 7 years almost like he was their own! We have a new puppy and we took her right in for a check up with Dr. Elizabeth, who is wonderful. I had a couple of vets before I moved to this area and they ran the gamut from lazy/didn't care to very expensive/pushy sales, and at Oak View I've experienced none of that. They genuinely care, their prices are reasonable, and they LOVE animals. :) I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new vet.

name: Kimberly Bavali
text: Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson take care of our dogs, Lucy and Cody.  We could not be more pleased with the quality of the treatment they receive. We have complete confidence in their expertise.  Beyond that, we greatly appreciate their kindness, warmth and personal approach.  They are just wonderful!  What a great staff as well!  The whole practice reflects a dedication to their mission.

name: Diann Hendon
text: I've always been pleased with the service they offer. Their kindness and concern for my dog is their greatest asset.  No question goes unanswered.  Also, it's great to get a call checking to see how my dog is doing........proves they care about their patients.  Everyone who works there is friendly and cares about everyone who comes to see them (pets and owners).  I will continue to take my pet there as long as I have a pet.

name: Laurie Howard
text: I love everyone that works here. Julie is my favorite. You all care, y’all are friendly, you love the animals. You don’t make it all about the money. Love you all. Thank you from Laurie, Nik, Charlee, and Cooper.

name: Kim Weaver
text: There was no wait time and I was in and out very quickly. Dr. Robinson is very knowledgeable and very helpful. The receptionist is very nice. The tech was great, and the Hospital Manager Brandy is amazing and very helpful. I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else!

resp.text: Kim - We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Madelyn P
text:
I’ve always had great service here and felt like my pets and even my family was cared for.

Several years back we had a family pet put to sleep here. He was twelve, and it was done in the most respectful, quiet, and dignified way possible. I really appreciated the staff and how genuine and empathetic everyone was.

Now we have two more family pets and I have to come up here with my (almost twin) babies. A technician or the secretary always helps me get my children and pets in and out in one safe trip.

I do not know the name of the technician that my son loves so much, but she is always here during the mornings and picks him up and carries him around and distracts him while I’m talking to the vet and waiting for my turn.

10/10 I’d recommend this vet to anyone

resp.text: Madelyn - THANK YOU! We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners and for all your kind words about our team.

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: A friend of my daughter's had her five pound kitten spayed and two kitty shots and the bill was $452. That is outrageous. I have no knowledge of the level of care but, I do feel that she was taken advantage of. We do lots of rescue work and have never seen charges like this. Lesson learned, never send a kid to a vet clinic like this one with her pet. I hate leaving a bad review but feel like a warning is necessary.

resp.text: Dana - we wish you would contact us directly with your concerns.  Then we could explain what was agreed upon before any services were performed.  Since you are not a client, we realize you do not know us and that Oak View Animal Hospital prides ourselves on treating each client like family and each patient like our own pet.  Our veterinarian spoke with the client about this situation directly and took steps to alleviate her concerns.

name: MR
text: I’ve been using Oak View for 9 years. Drs. Price and Robinson took great care of my dog then, and my dogs since. Dr. Robinson is always very thorough and listens and responds to all my questions. All are helpful and have been compassionate throughout the lives of the three dogs I’ve brought in to Oak View.

resp.text: We appreciate you & your dogs being part of our family for all these years!! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Laurabi Lace
text: I recently got a puppy and asked my friends and coworkers to recommend a good vet. Everyone I talked to said Oak View is the best. A few had stories of other vets they had used that they were not happy with. They are so sweet to our little girl. We are very happy with them.

resp.text: Welcome to the Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your puppy. We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Monica Moore
text: I have had so many positive experiences with this vet.  The vet personally called several times to check on my fur baby after surgery.  We went in for another issue and the vet personally called to check on her to make sure she was improving as hoped.  Would recommend them to anyone looking for a vet!!  Added plus the front desk lady is super sweet and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you!  Our staff enjoys taking care of Oreo and all of our clients.

name: Mary Jo Sewell
text: The staff and doctors are always so friendly at Oak View.  Anytime one of our pets have had to have surgery, or been hurt, the next day Dr. Robinson will call personally  to check and make sure they are doing okay.  We have never had our animals treated this well.  We love her for the wonderful care she gives our pets. The staff make each and every one of our pets feel like a "rock star!"  I highly recommend this vet!

resp.text: So happy you are part of our family! Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners looking for a veterinarian.

name: Natalie
text: The vet here is for real probably the sweetest and kindest PERSON I’ve ever met in my life. She loves animals and is somehow just as nice to humans. I LOVE this place. Even the front desk people are sweet. We’ve been going here for many years now and have never had bad service.

name: Birmingham Chapter
text: I have been using Oak View Animal Hospital for 5 years. They have taken wonderful care of my sweet dog Maggie. The entire staff is incredibly nice. Dr. Price is wonderful. He provided a treatment option for my dog who was having trouble leaking urine when other vets I had been to were unable to help. They will personally call and check-up on your pet if they have been sick or injured. I have been very pleased with the exceptional care they have provided for our family!

name: Lacey Bacchus
text: I recommend Oak View to everyone.  The doctors and staff are personable, caring and friendly and take a genuine interest in your pet's health.  I had used a previous vet in the past and never felt like they remembered me or my dog and never called to follow-up like Oak View does.

name: Booba Byars
text: Could not have been a better experience. All aspects of the results of my needs being met were great! My dog Sully rules and he loves it when I take him to Oak View Animal Hospital. The staff members are tops and I love them all. I am known for telling it like it is - good or bad. I tell you it is GOOD!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  We love having you & Sully part of the Oak View family!

name: Kara Haddock
text: Dr. Robinson is very sweet and caring and she truly cares about your pets well being. Front desk staff are always friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Oak View!

resp.text: Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!

name: Shana Moton
text: My husband and I have been taking our sweet pups to Oak View Animal Hospital for the past three years.  We completely trust their care to Dr. Price and Robinson, and staff.  Not only do they love on our animals, but we have always been treated with the highest respect and sweetness each time we're there.

name: Kelly Ezell
text: Dr. Bradac, Julie, Lee and the rest of the team at Oak View have given my Tebow the best of care for the past 4 years.  Thank you all for your compassion for both my beloved pet and for me.

resp.text: Kelly - Thank you!  We are grateful you shared your thoughts to recommend us to other pet owners.  We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: Freeman White
text: Great customer service, very friendly and great groom job on my dog

name: Yvonne Waldon
text:
Oak View Animal Hospital, Dr. Robinson, Dr. Price and their staff are the best!!
They are warm and friendly.  You will not find more concern or better care for your
pet's needs anywhere.  Without a doubt, they are "TOPS"!!!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: Drs. Price and Robinson are great.  My dogs and cats have been seeing them for years.  Not only do I appreciate their professional work they are very compassionate towards the pets as well.  Also, their entire staff is wonderful, so friendly and truly interested in your pet.

name: Joseph Gay
text: A great group of people that really cares about your pet and you. My dog would have died if it hadn't been for them agreeing to seeing him on a Saturday as a walk-in. Most of the other area Vets were closed or I was told they just see their regular clients on Saturdays. It has been 4 years since that date, my dog is doing fine and he loves going to see the staff at Oak View Animal Hospital. My parents use them them as well and we always board our pets with them when we go out of town. Ms. Renee is always a pleasure to talk to, she the first person you see coming through the door. She remembers you and your pets names. You dont have to tell her who you are when you come in. Great People and God Bless you all.

name: Jill Graham
text: We love Oak View. Dr. Robinson and Dr. Bradac are both so kind and always take time to call and check on our pups after visits. All of the staff that we have interacted with are great!

resp.text: Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners. We appreciate you  sharing your thoughts on Dr. Robinson, Dr. Bradac & Oak View!

name: Nicholle Brendlinger
text: Dr. Robinson knowledge and competence inspires confidence always, but her exceptional kindness, compassion and support during less than optimal circumstances truly make her stand out as an exceptional veterinarian. We are blessed to have her.

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Dr. Robinson and Oak View!

name: Sara Downs
text: We just recently moved to Pelham and Oak View Animal Hospital is at the end of our neighbor hood! We took one of our two dogs there for her yearly check up and everyone from the front desk to the vet assistant to the doctor were great and very friendly. We loved the Dr. Robinson, she was very nice, took time with us and answered all the questions that we had. One weekend we had my brother in law's dog with us and noticed that he had a couple of fleas and called them on Saturday morning and asked if there was anyway that we could come and get a flea pill for him even though he has never been seen there before and she said of course and was very helpful!! I would recommend them to everyone!!

name: Deirdre Morgan
text: Oak View has taken care of my furry children for almost 16 years; starting with our lovely lady of a dachshund, Lucy; whom we lost to the "Rainbow Bridge" a long time ago, through our grumpy lady, Callie, the tortoise shell cat, who was never pleasant to them, and on to our current pair of feline girls who they take very good care of.  A little over two months ago, we had to make the difficult decision to let Callie go.  The vets and staff at Oak View were very supportive to Callie and us and we could not have asked for better people to be with us at a very difficult time.  I will never forget what they did for us then and what they continue to do.  Blessings to everyone there.

name: Darla Spinosi
text: This place is great!  It's located at the edge of a residential section of Pelham, it's been there as long as I can remember.  They've been around for a long time for good reason.  They really care.  The doctor always calls me after to check on my pet's recovery.  And recover they do!  These people have saved my pets more than a few times.  And their fees are quite reasonable.  I will never change vet clinics!

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family all these years! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Steve Hutto
text: I've been taking my dogs here for 3 years. I had to euthanize 2 of my Jack Russell's here and the staff was amazing. Very respectful and sympathetic. They now take care of our 1 yr old Labradoodle for grooming and shots. Wouldn't take her anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate you being a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family and recommending us to other Pelham pet owners.

name: Annmarie Burch
text: I have used Oak View since 2006. My dogs love it there. The staff makes you feel so comfortable. I am emotionally attached to my kids well dogs. My baby girl Missy is getting older now going blind and i dropped her off for a grooming. My baby had a seisure they called me immediately just asked if i was still close by. I was. When i got there they told me what happened. I fell over crying. The staff sat with me watched my baby girl called the next day to check on her. This place is amazing.

resp.text: We treat patients like our own pets and worried about Missy.  Our doctors & staff are so glad to have you a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family!

name: W Price
text: This place has been our vet for years.  Always easy to get an appt; friendly staff; great pet care.  Dr. Robinson is great.

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts on Dr. Robinson & Oak View!

name: Halie Lindsey
text: If I could give a higher rating a definitely would! The Doctors and staff are amazing and my kitten and I went home very happy! We have definitely found our new vet!

resp.text: Welcome to our Oak View Animal Hospital family!  Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your kitten.  We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Amber Gomez-Mueller
text:
I don't have words for how much I love our family at OVAH, or how thankful we are for everything they do. Our fur babies are as excited to see the OVAH staff as they are when we arrive home at the end of the day after work.

I only have one complaint...  I don't see any photos of our dogs on their Google page. We need to remedy that 😁

resp.text: Amber THANK YOU for you & our dogs being part of Oak View Animal Hospital!  We are grateful you took the time to share your thoughts. Post some pictures on our Facebook page or you can upload pictures also here to our Google page :-)

name: Julie Crawford
text: I have known Dr. Price for several years and he has been a great friend and personally saved two of my animals. Great doctor. Better person.

name: Kitty McCoy
text: I have been extremely pleased with the kind and loving services provided by the doctors and staff at Oak View Animal Hospital. They are courteous and always give the greatest attention to my pet's needs, in addition to a warm welcome whenever we arrive!

name: Janet Attaway
text: Stephanie is a mini-schnauzer.  She is now 4 years old. She has gone to Oak View since the day I brought her home.  She  loves Miss Renee and tries to make a puddle every time she sees her.  Miss Renee took my Facebook profile photo - of course, it was of Stephanie and her big yellow duck

resp.text: We enjoy seeing you & Stephanie every time you visit Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: j w
text: Great!

name: Whitney Gay
text: Dr. Robinson, Dr. Price and all of the staff at Oak View are amazing. We started our dog's care here right after we adopted her from the humane society. We loved how she was treated and how we were treated. After that we transferred our cat's care here, because we were not satisfied with our other vet and had had such a good experience with Oak View. They treated our cat's chronic and severe UTI and he hasn't had one in 2 years; where as at the other vet we felt like he was not being fully treated and was having unnecessary testing for his diagnosis. In Sept. 2013 we noticed that our dog was not acting like herself and it was after hours, so we took her to the ER vet and they misdiagnosed her with gastritis. We took her to Dr. Price the next day because she had gotten severely worse. Within minutes he diagnosed her with an IMHA, which is a very serious, usually fatal, diagnosis. He sat down with me and explained the disease and treatment course. He stayed with her through the night while she received a blood transfusion, to ensure that she didn't have a reaction to it. He even called me late that night to give me an update. Now nine months later she is her perky self. I would never trust my pets to anybody but Oak View! They are so compassionate, caring and knowledgeable. You won't find a better vet in the Birmingham area!

name: Jeanette Proctor
text: Treat us and our pets like family,  love Oak View! Absolutely recommend them to anyone in need of veterinary care for their pets.  Also offer expert grooming and boarding services.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on Oak View Animal Hospital!   We care for all our patients like they are our own pets.  Thanks for being a part of our family!

name: Gary Grimes
text: The best care your animals can find in the area.  Very caring and helpful staff.

resp.text: Gary -  Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  We appreciate you sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Linda Dennis
text: Can't say enough nice things about all the doctors and their staff, they are ALL very caring. My best friends and family take their animals to the "View" for care also, and we are all very happy with Oak View and their expertise and care of our precious fur-babies.

resp.text: Thank you for being a part Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your furbabies. We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: April Danielson
text: I can't say enough good things about Dr. Robinson. She's a gem and truly cares about our dog. We found her on a recommendation from a family member because our dog needed surgery. Our vet couldn't do it, so we came to Dr. Robinson. We won't be leaving now and all 4 of our animals will be under her care. You will be very glad that you found this practice. :)

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts.  Welcome to the Oak View Animal Hospital family!! We are your partner in your pet's health and happy your dog will be getting better! Dr. Robinson & all our staff say thanks for recommending us to other pet owners!

name: Cheryl Hutcheson
text: We found Oak View while fostering for a local rescue group. I immediately could tell how much they cared about the animals *and* the people. We started making arrangements right away to transfer our other animals to their care. I wasn't really unhappy where we were but there are no words to describe how much Dr Price *obviously* loves his job and his patients. There have been several times when he has called over the weekend or in the evenings just to check on our pet who was not feeling well. In all my years of owning animals, I had also never had a vet who gave you their personal contact information and never hesitated to answer right away! The rest of the people at the clinic are wonderful as well and Renee is always such a joy to see when you come in. We can't imagine ever using another clinic and I would follow Dr Price anywhere he moved his practice!

name: Lisa Arnold
text: I was very happy with the services today. Although, I was called and told she was ready after 5 hrs for a bath and nails grinding, she was not ready. They did correct the problem with the nails.

resp.text: Lisa Thank you! We are grateful you took the time to share your thoughts & recommend Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks to you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: Tracy Vinzant
text: The welcome desk staff Renee is exceptionally friendly, and you can tell she truly cares about her job and the clients (both people and fur babies!)

resp.text: Thanks for recommending us to other pet owners!  We appreciate you sharing your thoughts.

name: lmeeler01
text: Oak View has been awesome in taking care of my 4 year old french bulldog.   She tends to get into things and the doctors and staff have helped her in the major issues with surgery, as well as, the day to day allergies and illnesses.

resp.text: Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners. We appreciate you & your your dog being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: Lenny Ferguson
text: Actually, maybe a .5 star. Oakview Animal Hospital told me I could adopt a perfectly adorable labradoodle, whom I'd begun loving the moment we met. I'd planned to pick him up the next day. Then I got a voicemail saying they'd given him away to someone else. They did not give me any advance notice. Their priority is animals, but their clients are human. OAH ought to really consider their bedside manner. I know OAH originally wanted this dog to be adopted with his buddy, and that's why they gave them both to someone else. But promising me the dog, who ran to me and put his head in my lap upon meeting, and then giving him to someone else is bloody rotten. I pulled all of my current dog's records from OAH and I will  never go back.

resp.text: We appreciate you wanting to adopt and provide a family to a homeless dog.  Our team reached out to you about the adopting of both dogs into one family for their best interest.  Please call our manager to discuss your concerns further.

name: Jill Hudson
text: Oak View is full of knowledgable and compassionate staff. They help you every step of the way, keep appointment times, and are thorough at every visit. I will never go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for being a part pf Oak View Animal Hospital's family! We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Kelly Morgan
text: We started taking our cat here right after we moved to Alabama. Our cat was having some issues with sores. They worked with us to find out what was wrong with our cat while considering the costs. Thanks to Oak View, we found out that our cat has a food allergy and with their recommended diet adjustments he has been happy and healthy ever since!

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts .Thank you for being a part of Oak View Animal Hospital's family!! We are your partner in your pet's health and happy your cat feels better!

name: Kim Satcher
text: I have been using Oak View Animal Hospital for several years now and I am very pleased with their service. They are always pleasant to deal with and are as good with their patient's owners as they are to their patients.

resp.text: We enjoy having you and your pets as part of the Oak View family!

name: Ramona Graffeo
text: There is no better vet in the area than Dr. Price!  He is knowledgable, great with both my pets as well as me!  As Dean Johnson (Dean of Veterinary Medicine at Auburn University) told me last week, you won't find a finer man and vet than Dr. Price!  When we needed him at the GBHS, he dropped everything and came to our aid! HE IS SIMPLY THE BEST!! 🐾🐶. On top of it all, his staff ROCKS!!

resp.text: Thank you!  Dr. Price and all of our doctors & staff are so glad to have you as a friend and are glad to help out Greater Birmingham Humane Society.

name: Francetta Gray
text: The staff was very friendly and I was very pleased with having my fur baby groomed for the first time. Thanks oak view

resp.text: Francetta Thank you! We are grateful you took the time to share your thoughts & recommend Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks to you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: Ronda Blair
text: Oak View has cared for & loved all of our pets -dog, cats, snakes & rabbits for nearly 20 years. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for being a part of Oak View Animal Hospital's family for 20 years!! We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts and your recommendation of Oak View to other pet owners.

name: Joe Clara
text: I just don't know where to start ......these folks are great! Great Doctors and great staff.  They all care and it shows.

name: Kellie Esposito
text: Great folks! Love Dr. Robinson!

name: Josh Pospy
text: They make me and my dog feel welcome every time we have visited. I will not take my dog to any other vet in the area.

resp.text: We appreciate you & your dog being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Meredith Pate
text: I looked and looked for a good vet since we are new to the area and I struggled to find a place to take out new puppy. But after reading all the excellent reviews I knew we had found the right vet. They were wonderful with our little Ruby Sue (Shih Tzu). I highly recommend them...from arriving to leaving it was an awesome experience! Very caring and never felt rushed. Every step was explained and our questions were answered in detail. Thank you so much Dr. Stipes, Julie, and Lee!

resp.text: Welcome to Oak View Animal Hospital!  So glad you found us by reading reviews and appreciate you further helping us by writing your own.  Appreciate the feedback and kind words and so glad to have you & Ruby Sue part of our family!

name: Penny Loyd
text: The vets and entire staff are caring and patient people.  We have three dogs and a senior cat so we visit Oak View a lot.  We never intend to go anywhere else.

name: Tyler Gaston
text: I have nothing but wonderful things to say about Oak View Animal Hospital- especially Dr. Stipes! She was able to work my kitty right in after he had gotten into a neighborhood scuffle.  She provides the best care for our fur babies and cannot imagine using anyone else for our pets' healthcare!!

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!  Thank you for being a part Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Dr. Stipes & all of our staff are your partners in your pet's health - and especially want to make sure they are ok after scuffles!

name: Tyler Robbins
text:
My story does not have a happy ending but I thank everyone at Oak View Animal Hospital for making the journey an amazing adventure.

I adopted Max from the Birmingham Humane Society. A year old border collie mix of some sort, who knows? I did my research looking for a vet and asked my friends who they recommended. Oak View came up multiple times so eventually i decided Oak View would be Max and mine's vet. I could not have been happier with the choice. They helped me take my firsts steps as friend and pet owner and made both of us feel like we were part of the family.

Max didn't have his first seizure until 3 months after i adopted him. Oak View walked me through the different reasons a dog can have a seizure and laid out a plan to help moderate or even eliminate Max's seizures. Had Max's condition been epilepsy or even one of the many normal conditions that can cause seizures i can honestly say Oak View would have been able to help him. Through the empirical method we tried everything to help Max. Unfortunately Max's grand mal seizures persisted and i lost a piece of my friend after each one. Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson admitted that this may be beyond their scope and I respect them all the more for it. I took Max to Neurologists, pathologists, and almost every specialist at Auburn and in between. No one could put a finger on it.

Within a year my friend was no longer himself. Oak View helped with his final moments and the level of caring and comfort they provided i will never forget. Thank you Oak View. I can never thank you enough for the love and support you gave Max and me.

If you are debating what Vet to use i highly recommend Oak View.

resp.text: Our sympathies on your loss - you worked hard to help him with his seizures and issues.  Our doctors and staff wished we could have helped Max and provided you with more time with him.  Thank you for working with us and other specialists to try to diagnose his conditions.  We wish the outcome was better for you and him.  Thank you for trusting us and allowing us to care for him.  If you do adopt again, we look forward to having you part of the Oak View family.

name: Bryan Stramer
text:
I cant say enough about this vet clinic.  My great dane was being boarded when his stomach twisted...   he was rushed to this clinic and the vet had to do emergency surgery.  I called as soon as i found out and was told my dog was in surgery and they called me several times with uodates.  The entire staff was friendly and helpful and they helped eleviate sone of the stress i was having.

I would highly recommend using this vet if your pet is ever on need of medical care.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you! So glad your dog is doing better!

name: Deana McGriff
text: These are the best in the world. They became my vets during the loss of my cat Smokie. They were kind, compassionate, and felt that loss with me. I live near Pell City, but I drive to Pelham to see Dr. Robinson, or Dr. Katie. They know me and my cats by name every time we have a visit. Wouldn't trust my fur babies to anyone else!

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate you and your cats being part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family.
Thanks for recommending us to other pet owners AND that you drive so far from Pell City to come see us!

name: Lauren Lewis
text: The staff is so friendly and helpful and Dr. Price is a top-notch veterinarian who is personal and more than qualified to help take care of your pup.

name: Trudy Johnson
text: I would never take a pet anywhere else! When you're here, you are all family! Don't live in the area? It's worth the drive!

name: JJEubank
text: There's a reason why Oakview has 28 perfect scores. They are the Best! If you are looking for a Pediatrician for your pet, this is the place. Not to mention they don't have to send you here or there to have a test run on your pet. They have an extensive lab and up to day equipment that can give you results most of the time very quickly. If not, Dr. Price has worked very hard to network with other specialized Veterinarians around the Southeast and beyond to partner with the care of your pet. The staff of Renee Porter, Julie Jordan Evans, Brandy Falletta and others have years of experience and work together as a team to ensure that you and your pet have as pleasant experience as possible. Even though Julie is a Tennessee fan. I guarantee that you will not only be pleased with Oakview but you will know that your pet is getting the best care possible.

name: Judeth Thomas
text: Switching vets is never easy, especially when you have a 100 pound dog who is terrified of everything, including strangers. But let me just say, I am SO thankful you guys are the first vet I tried after moving to the Pelham/Helena area! I can NOT thank Dr. Katie Stipes and the rest of the amazing team at OV for taking such great care of my babies for the first time today! You guys were so sweet to my super timid big baby AND kitty. So thankful we found the perfect vet so close to home! Bubba and Fitz will learn to love you guys, too ;)

resp.text: Welcome to Oak View Animal Hospital! So glad you found us and appreciate you helping us by writing recommendations to other Pelham & Helena pet owners. Appreciate the feedback and kind words and so glad to have you, Bubba & Fitz part of our family!

name: Patriot Thunder
text:
The best!!
We love Sydney!!

name: Kacey Hayes
text: Drs. Price and Robinson have taken care of our adopted family for years. My fur kids are actually excited when they realize they're going to the vet. Oak View treats every animal like they're family, and as long-time clients we appreciate this beyond words. Two days ago we had to make the awful decision to let our baby Matilda go home forever, and Dr. Robinson and the staff were so patient, kind and understanding. They care as much about your animal's wellbeing as you do. I couldn't recommend them highly enough, and am so grateful that we have them as healthcare providers.

name: Brooke Beadle
text: Dr. Jay is the best, as are all of the techs and people that work at Oak View Animal Hospital!!! Roman had to get treated for heartworms and although a really not fun experience for him, they did a great job and he is heartworm-free!!! They are so thorough with everything they do, and they even followed up with phone calls and cards to make sure Roman was ok and feeling better! They also try to make everything they do is as financially feasible for us as possible. i really appreciate everything they do! I will definitely be bringing Roman back to them in the future!!

name: Ashley Santiago
text: Love the staff here!

name: Larabeth Guthrie
text: I have been highly impressed by Drs. Price and Robinson every time I have taken my puppy to them.  I'm so spoiled by the high level of care and attention to detail that I hope I never have to take Elsa anywhere else!!!

We can't say enough good things about Oak View. We have been clients for years and would not dream of going anywhere else.
Sincerely,
Woo & Saki Edmondson 🐶

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts!  We appreciate you being a part of the Oak View family for so many years.  Always enjoy seeing you and your family!  Thanks for the kind words.

name: Natalie Virciglio
text: Dr. Price is the best vet ever. So caring.

name: Registration Team Birmingham CEE
text: My dogs have been cared for by the professionals at Oak View Vets for 25 years.  I'd highly recommend them.

name: Linda Buckner

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts. Thank you for being a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family!! We are your partner in your pet's health and appreciate you recommending us to other Pelham area pet owners!

name: Heather K.
text: Could not ask for kinder, more knowledgeable people to look after my pets. If you’re reading the reviews looking for a vet, stop your search and give Oakview a call.

resp.text: Appreciate the kind words! Thank you for the feedback and recommendations to other pet owners. So glad you are part of our family!

text: Compassionate and smart staff that truly care about the animals.

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts. Thank you for being a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family!! We are your partner in your pet's health and appreciate you recommending us to other Pelham area pet owners!

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts on Dr. Robinson & Oak View!

name: Elizabeth Stowe
text: The whole team at Oak View is amazing!

resp.text: Elizabeth - We appreciate you recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Sandra Boone
text: We’re new to the area, our dog was bitten by something & needed to be seen ASAP, brought him right on down, filled out the paperwork & within 10min they were out to get him. Very friendly & professional staff! Not to mention the prices were very reasonable! Would definitely recommend them to anyone in need! God Bless the Vet & all the staff that helped with our sweet baby. Praying I never need them again but if I do I know he will be safe with them!

name: Mikayla Tate
text: They do not care about the health of animals here. They are money hungry and just plain out rude people. I wouldn’t waste any money/ or time at this place. I can guarantee they won’t help you properly.

name: Wendie Warren
text: I paid $280 after sitting in parking lot for over two hours ( 2a.m.-4:30 a.m.) with my dog without him being treated. My dog was in extreme pain the whole time. I left some time after 6 a.m. My dog is still sick and in pain and I have no answers still. I have no extra funds to have him seen again. I shouldnt have had to pay this much for nothing. I could take him to his Veterinarian if I had not wasted it there.

name: Jeremy (Jackal City)
text: They took us seriously wether or not the situation was serious for our kitten and communicated with us openly about our kitten at a time of what we thought was an emergency. She happily dealt with my "google doctoring" questions and happily communicated specific advice and concerns for our kittens health. I feel better knowing they are available for emergencies.

name: Valerie Morente
text: Our little rat terrier was attacked by a large dog. He did a lot of damage. I called every vet in Panama City and nobody answered as it was the weekend. As a last ditch effort I tried Dothan and SRVS was first to come up. They were so friendly, kind and helpful.  They kept coming to the car to update us on her condition. Their price was a fraction of what it would have been anywhere in Panama City. I've never had such a good experience, considering the circumstances. Our little dog is doing better. Thank you SRVS for helping our dog and treating us like we were more than just a number. Y'all are the best!

name: Lynn Hornsby
text: I’ve never done a review but I think SRVS deserves my first. Everyone I came in contact with was exceptionally nice and exhibited a caring attitude to my Roxy. I will say I was a bit nervous about leaving her with the staff I was unable to meet which I totally understand. After talking to Dr. Davis I felt totally comfortable leaving her. Dr. Davis himself called me multiple times during the 24 hours Roxy was there. Thanks Harriet for getting us appointment so quickly!

name: Benji Carnley
text: 3 /18/2021     4:00am my babygirl wants to go out to potty and I notice she is stumbling around and wobbly on her feet like she’s drunk, needless to say my heart sinks to the floor, she was fine a few hours ago and now she can barely stand. Rushed her to SRVES and doctor Drew Davis literally braves a tornado warning to come to the office and see my girl!  Tentative diagnosis “old dog Vestibular disease”. In most cases the dog recovers within 7-14 days, my mind is now more at ease though it pains me to see her in that condition and know that I just have to basically wait it out. Well 48 hours later she is still wobbly but 1000% better than when I took her to SRVES. A HUGE thank you to dr. Drew Davis and and the nurse who’s name I didn’t get for your wonderful bedside manner and putting my mind at ease. Can’t say enough good things about them, when my girl was about 4 years old she liked to chase cars and one day finally caught one resulting in a broken jaw. SRVES repaired her jaw. Every time I have needed them they have been there, that kind of peace of mind is priceless.

name: Brandon Lolley
text: I did not  have a lot of money at the time but they took care of my dog beyond what they had to and beyond what any other vet Iv ever been to has they did so much more than they had to and I am very thankful I definitely recommend this place they where very caring and kind . I know where to go if I ever need to make another vet visit.

name: Kittie Jones Cook
text: Had to set in car for 3 hours while other pets got seen before us that got there after our cat. They acted like our cat wasn't as important as the dogs that kept coming in after us.

name: Rhonda Smith
text: Took my cat in for difficult breathing problems. He had been mouth breathing for about 6 months and getting only temporary relief from steroid shots. It took Dr. Martin about 2 min to find the problem! Dr. Martin removed a large Polyp from my cats sinuses . It was blocking his airway.  Now, my fur baby can breath through his nose like a normal cat!  The staff was very friendly and professional. Everything was up front and no hidden charges! Thank u Dr. Martin and staff for helping my fur baby!

name: Hope Snapp
text: The service is great and they are very caring and professional.  However, the cost is outrageous for emergency service. The cost is more than double what a vet would charge, but they know they can extort this money from people because you are in an emergency situation where you either have to pay their fortune or let your pet die. I just paid 950.00 for my cat who had bladder stones because I had no other choice and they know this.  I am very grateful for the care he received and fortunately I was able to pay it, but many people in that situation would not be able to do this and would have to let their pet suffer.

name: Debbie Whittaker
text: My little dog Penny has had 2 successful knee surgeries ( one on each knee). Dr. Martin and his staff were very kind and compassionate with me and Penny and took time to explain what needed to be fixed and how it would be fixed. They were available 24 hours in case I needed to call with concerns. She is on her way to a full recovery and so thankful to SRVS for helping her live a pain free life.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind remarks.  We are so thankful that Penny had great results.  Please keep us up to date on how Penny is doing and if we can do anything else for you both.

name: Kenneth Owen
text: Regularly reported mistreating or offering EXTREMELY poor service for pets who are suffering, all while demanding more and more and more money, refusing to see the animals while they're dying until you make a payment, then refusing continued life saving treatment until payment. Unreal that they literally have YEARS of bad reviews and they're still in business.

name: V Gregor
text:
The staff and doctors are absolutely fantastic at this vet clinic.
We brought in our dog Phoenix for his second ACL surgery, the first one was performed in Panama City and the other side needed to be done, they did an absolutely fabulous job on Phoenix, he is turning 10 and he is completely back to normal. For complex surgeries I would always pick this vet clinic over anybody else. Thank you so much for taking his pain away and bringing him back joy to his life. Before the surgery we were able to see the pain in his face for months, we are so grateful.

resp.text: That is exactly why we are here!  We specialize in surgery and are thankful we were able to provide great care to Phoenix.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you and thank you for your comment.

name: Susan Wiest
text: At the very end of 3/20 our dog ruptured her CCL and tore her meniscal cartilage.  This was at the very beginning of COVID19; however they remained open with professional phone and curbside service.  We drove our dog, Daisy, from Lynn Haven, FL to Dothan for surgery.  They were professional and caring.  It's now seven months later and she has healed wonderfully!  She gets to run, play, and go hiking with us again.  Her surgery, TTA-2, was a wonderful blessing! Thank you so much!!!

name: John Downer
text: Eight weeks post surgery and our 90 lb blue healer (JD) is doing fantastic. Everything concerning his care was superb. Staff was the best ,very helpful & understanding. Dr. Martin's skills were an absolute blessing from heaven for our pet. We are most greatful

name: Kathleen Cassels
text: My 4 year old  Dachshund, Elsa, needed a disc surgery which required an over night stay. Dr. Martin and his staff were very knowledgeable in their diagnosis, as well as, very kind and compassionate to Elsa . I was informed within a short time after Elsa's surgery from Dr. Martin himself as to how everything went during the operation. In addition, I was impressed to find out that  on the day of Elsa's surgery ,and the following day, Dr. Martin took the time to call Elsa's hometown Veterinarian {Dr. France, Cairo, GA } to keep her informed of her progress. I 'd like to mention his technicians and his office staff members who were very professional. Thank you , again,  SRV Specialists!

name: maxnmimi
text: My GSD was in serious pain and it was determined she had severe case of hip dysplasia . I made contact with this Vet facility, after Auburn University Vet hospital recommended Dr. Martin for her hip replacement surgery. I made several calls over a month ago to get my GSD seen,  I never call a got back from them, each time i called, they said they would get back to me. After two weeks, my husband was able to get an appt the following next week. he drove two hours from columbus, ga to dothan al. They did an assessment and took some graphs of my GSD. and we paid close to 400 dollars and then said they could contact my husband to schedule hip surgery for my GSD. One week later we haven't heard from them, my husband called them again, only to have them say they cannot do it and recommended someone in Virginia, eight hours away.  Totally worthless and time wasted as my GSD is suffering. We found another vet facility that can do the surgery... Awful customer service, beware if you care about the medical treatment of your beloved pets!!

name: Tayvien White
text: The staff was really nice, however I don’t feel as if they really tried to treat my dog or figure out what was wrong with him. He’s not aggressive by any means, he was scared and not sure of his surroundings, with a muzzle on, on top of being surrounded by strangers so he wasn’t at ease. They took him to the back and I went with them to try and calm him down, he wouldn’t calm down because he wanted the muzzle off, in the mist of all this they were asking me how much I wanted to spend and to come to the front so they could charge me the $112 by the time they ran my card they came out and said they didn’t know what was wrong they gave him a shot to calm him down that’s $30 and to take him to Auburn they have the proper equipment to treat him, so I left and took him to Panama City (Animal Care) he walked to the car and petted him and walked him inside with out a muzzle on and talked to him the whole time and he was at ease. Come to find out he had chewed up my inhaler and it was causing his dilated eyes, pacing and his confusion.  The vet  was even dumbfounded to find out they were trying to send me to Auburn and didn’t understand why they didn’t all leave the room for me to remove the muzzle and calm him down, and how they didn’t even try! He even apologized for their actions and for me making a 1.30 drive for absolutely no reason he didn’t even charge me for my 11p visit & he kept apologizing on their behalf & made it clear if they’re afraid of a dog they are in the wrong professional field.

resp.text: Mr. White, to clarify events, your dog was very aggressive upon arrival and you were not even able to control his behavior.  You stated that you even had difficulty loading him in the car.  One of our techs was injured in the process of handling your dog and you were in the room when he was actively aggressive toward everyone.  We refunded your exam too since we were not able to put hands on your dog.  We did sedate your dog with no effect while here and referred to Auburn since Auburn has specialists and criticalists equipped to handle such situations.  By the time you arrived at Animal Care Center, the sedation was likely in full effect and possibly the effects of the inhaler (which was not disclosed to us) were dissipating.   I am not surprised at your testimony that your dog was behaving much better BUT he was heavily sedated at the time.  We cannot treat what we cannot evaluate which is why you were refunded the exam fee and referred to Auburn.  We are pleased to know that the sedation King received helped make it possible for another veterinarian to evaluate him.

name: Joshua Jones
text:
Unfortunately I've had the terrible experience of having to choose between euthanizing my dog and seeing her suffer.  This had nothing to do with how she had been cared for her whole life, seeing how she had lived well beyond her life expectancy and was a very happy and loving.  I knew her life was coming to a close but when I found her collapsed on the back porch one day after letting her out , she appeared to be suffering from a stroke or cerebral hemorrhage I took her to Southern Regional  Veterinary Specialist because it was the weekend and my usual Veterinarian was closed. The staff were very helpful and caring but unfortunately there was nothing that could be done except ending any pain or suffering that she may have been experiencing.  The experience was awful but the staff were very kind.

A few months after this I was looking after a friends place in a rural area when I kept hearing a persistent tiny meowing from a kitten.  Unfortunately his hind leg had been pinned and severely mangled and I was afraid I was going to have to once again have to poor animal euthanized but after once again having to take the animal to southern Regional because it was the only vet open they reassured me that they could save the animals life and that he would have a good chance of having a pretty normal and happy life albeit without one limb. I choose to adopt the poor critter and spend the money to have the amputation performed. I can say that although the price was what I would describe as fairly considerable, its been by far the best choice I've ever made. The cat and I have bonded like no other animal and I have before. I am very thankful that the staff explained that the kitten would very likely survive the amputation surgery and go on to have a normal and happy life as an indoor cat. I was worried about him not being able to get around well or being handicapped by the surgery but they assured me that since he was so young he would very likely adjust and go on to adapt to not having it and indeed this is what happened.  He is very happy, loving, playful and gets around just as well as any cat I've ever had. He's very fast and can jump on a counter top with very little difficulty and has had no problems to speak of  besides not being able to scratch behind his ear very well on the affected side,  which I happily scratch for him when I see the need or he brings it to my attention.   A can not give any kind of review about any of the other services that southern Regional may have or offer but when it comes to emergency pet care, they have by and far been the most reliable and accessible solution no matter the situation.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your story and experience with the emergency practice.  We are thankful we were here to help you and are still here if you need us in the future.

name: kimberly arnold
text: Wonderful, caring staff.  Quick service!!  My 18 month old pup got in a fight with a fishing rig and lost.  Hook set in his mouth.  Quick surgical procedure to cut out, remove and stitch up.  Very reasonable considering it was a Sunday night!  Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words regarding your experience.  We have seen a fair number of fish hooks and were thankful Buddy was not badly hurt.  Thank you for trusting us with his care and let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future.

name: L.R. Kirkland, Jr.
text: My family has needed SRVS Emergency Services on two occasions for the care of beloved pets.  The first time, our pet expired due to sudden cardiac death while in route to SRVS.  On arrival the staff acted swiftly to assess Bailey’s condition and determine further resuscitation was futile.   Dr. Sennett and the entire staff were compassionate and comforting  when we needed those exact expressions of care.  More recently, our eleven year old Siamese, Bonnie Blue, suddenly became seriously ill.  Dr. Tabitha Barber, who admitted Bonnie to their hospital and stabilized her condition, carefully reviewed the many possible diagnoses, X-Ray’s and lab findings with us, stayed near Bonnie’s side through the night, responded quickly when seizure activity began around 4:00 AM and called me with an update.  The next morning Dr Martin continued assessing Bonnie’s condition and agreed with Dr Barber that she appeared to have a central brain malfunction of some kind, due to a vascular event, a lymphoma or other unknown cause. Dr. Martin didn’t hesitate in recommending sending Bonnie to Auburn for further evaluation and treatment. Dr. Martin’s staff called the referral to Auburn and made for a smooth transfer.  We are so grateful that Dr Barber and Dr Martin encouraged us to seek further care at Auburn’s School of Veterinary Medicine.  Because of their solid recommendation to transfer the patient to Auburn, Bonnie has made a near 100% recovery at five weeks out.  Dothan is truly fortunate to have this 24-hour Emergency Medicine and Regional Surgical Referral Center for Animals.

name: Amanda Traum
text: Amazing customer service. Patient staff who took their time to explain my dogs situation to me and laid out in layman's terms, my options. DR. Martin is great at his surgical procedures which, when healing do not have much scarring.  He is also extremely knowledgeable and talented at his job.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience.  If there is anything else we can do for you, please let us know.

name: Jane Kemp
text:
We were very pleased with the surgery our dog (Max) received at their hospital.

Dr. Martin is a wonderful surgeon & a very kind man.  The staff was also great!

resp.text: I am so glad that Max is doing well.  We are so thankful that you trusted us with his care.

name: Doug Johnson
text: Such a nice and caring staff. I am very appreciative of the care Stormy received while he was here.

resp.text: We were glad that we were here for Stormy.  Thank you for your comment.

name: Kimberly Hall
text: This is an emergency hospital for pets. It's open on the weekends after hours. It's a very good place to go in an emergency.  My niece's dog got hit by a car and we had to find someone quick to see Sofie. The lady there was very helpful and caring. Eventhough we went up there twice. She helped explain what was going on with our beloved Sophie and helped my niece accept the fact she was gone. It was a very trying time and tragic for all, and they were very respectful. I thank them form the bottom of my heart for there patience and comfort.

name: Dr Bart Precourt
text: Our 1 year old English Bulldog had a spine surgery performed by Dr. Martin.  He was very professional and we had a successful surgery.  Our pup stayed two nights at the hospital and the staff loved on him like he was family.  The front desk ladies were amazing and very caring.

name: Rachel Carrico
text:
Over the weekend my cat suffered a seizure. I took him to a vet in Ozark where they ran some tests, were not able to find any definitive reasons why it happened, told me to let him rest and return if he did not improve. On Sunday morning I woke up and my cat was unresponsive. I was unable to get in contact with the emergency number I was given to this vet, and was forced to look for an emergency vet to take him to. I am so thankful my fiance was able to find SRVS emergency vet.

We arrived and they rushed to us to take a look to see what was going on. After only a few minutes they were able to tell me what I already suspected; that he would not recover and would need to be euthanized. At some point he had suffered a stroke and had symptoms that would not improve. It was with a heavy heart we said our goodbyes, but the staff explained everything and gave us all the time we needed to make sure we were ready.

The staff was very professional, and just today I received a sympathy card in the mail with my cat's paw prints in memory of him that brought me to tears. I plan to get it framed and put up in my house, and I am SO thankful to them for not only taking care of my fur baby, but taking the time to send something so meaningful to me to hold onto forever. THANK YOU!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to post this review.  We are very sorry for your loss and were glad to be here for you when you needed help.  I will be sure to pass this along to our staff.

name: jennifer barfield
text: Very kind, compassionate care! I’m so thankful for the care and love we received.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us to provide that care and for your comments!

name: Jennifer Henderson
text:
Thank you for saving our Remington! The staff was wonderful and very caring and supportive. I never met the doctor but have heard great things. If I had any complaint it would be that they tell you that you have to pay $400 or what ever the cost they think it will be before they will treat your dog that is kinda concerning thinking a dog could be there and dying but they won't help till the money comes through. I had to call a relative to pay over the phone before they would help him.
But I guess that's the world we live in now. I am still very grateful for the service and the staff my Remi is still here thanks to SRVS.
THANK YOU THANK YOU!!

resp.text: Unfortunately you are correct, we have been taken advantage of and have established protocols that give the appearance of not caring or only caring about the money.  While we would love to do everything for free, there is no way we would be able to stay in business and then we wouldn’t be available at all.  Thank you for posting this review and for understanding our position.  It is difficult for some to understand.

name: Teeta Simmons
text: Dr. Robert Martin has amazing knowledge and surgical skills.  We are so lucky to have this facility here in Dothan. Dr. Martin performed thyroid surgery on our cat Harley and he is back to his old self, which is really amazing!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear Harley is doing so well.  Thank you for letting us know and please let us know if there is anything else we can do to help you in the future.

name: Jean Sasson
text: Southeast Alabama is extremely fortunate to have such a facility and one of the best veterinarians it has been my pleasure to know:  Dr. Robert Martin.  After some cruel person abandoned a sick cat and it made its way to my yard, I had to make my way to Dr. Martin.  The poor little darling Marilyn Monroe was born with a terrible disorder that had her overeating, followed by projective vomiting.  She is a midget of a kitty cat due to the lack of nourishment.  I was fearful that she could not be saved but after a simple description from me, Dr. Martin immediately knew the problem. After running the appropriate tests, sure enough, he was right -- yesterday Marilyn Monroe underwent the operation to solve her problem and save her life.  Tonight she is home and happy.  Without Dr. Martin's years of expertise, I am not sure Miss Marilyn could have been saved.  I am happy.  Marilyn Monroe is happy.  The world is good again.  Thanks, Dr. Martin.  Your impressive skills are certainly appreciated by this client and her sweet kitty kat.  To everyone out there, if you have an unusual health problem with a pet, Dr. Martin is certainly the man to see.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Sasson for sharing your account.  We are so happy that we were able to help Marilyn Monroe and are thankful for her positive result.  Please keep in touch and let us know if there is anything else we can do.

name: Terry Leach
text: The Staff and Doctor Martin were very friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone 😊

name: Chris Speigner
text:
Took my mothers dog in for emergency care. 1 year later I have a collections notice in the mail.
Never received the bill, which was for my mother in the first place. I find it funny that they can send me to collections and not even attempt to communicate to me.
Scott the Office Admin was very rude on the phone, wouldn't even talk to me at all because "you can speak to my attorney, attorney will talk to you, I am not going to communicate with you"

I hope this place never gets business again. Plenty of other vets in the area.

name: Brittany Ball
text: Dr. Martin is amazing! There are no words to express the gratitude my family and I have towards him and his team. Rebecca and the whole entire staff has been amazing to my sweet Callie during this tough time for her. Thank you for everything! I would not have wanted Callie’s health to be in anyone else’s hands.

resp.text: We are so glad that Callie is making positive improvements.  Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to leave a review.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to assist you in the future.

name: Bob Young
text: Wonderful place, we were referred there from Lynn Haven Florida because out local vets could not do the operation on our cat Jinxy. They simply saved his life and we couldn't be more thankful and appreciative.

resp.text: We are so glad that Jinxy is doing so well.  Please let us know if you have any questions or anything else we can help you with in the future.

name: Frank Scott
text:
Our dog Charlie had a possibility ruptured disc Late one night. We were referred to your service
By our Vet in Panama City. We called Southern Regional Veterinary Specialist at 0930 on Monday morning to asked for an appt., and they asked how soon we could get there. So so we drove straight there and they saw us in just 15 mins., the Receptionist Harriet, was the kindness and the most thoughtful young lady we ever met in a Dr.'s office. The entire Staff were truely professional and caring. Then we meet Dr. Martin and we see why, he provides his patients and their family with professional assessments.  And you could tell that he really cared for the animals under his care. Dr. Martin diagnosed Little Charlie problem accurately and then operated. Dr Martin also keep us informed ever step along the way. Charlie was doing so well we brought him home 22 hrs later.
My Wife and I would be remiss if we did not write this letter of recommendation.  Let me say we are sure
You will find Dr. Martin And his entire Staff as one of most Godly and Professional Vet offices you will
Ever have the pleasure too visit.
Dr. Martin and Staff, well done good and faithful Servants!
Semper Fi Frank. Scott

resp.text: How is Charlie doing?  Thank you for your comments.  We try to be able to see everyone as soon as possible and are so thankful to make room for you and Charlie.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Kim Lee
text: Dr Martin walks on water as far as we are concerned!!  Our Marty had back surgery several years ago after an Ozark "vet" told me to put him in a BOX!!  He walks and runs and is a very happy dog!❤️🐾

resp.text: Marty is so fortunate to have you and your husband as owners.  We are so pleased that he is doing well and that you gave him the opportunity to get better.  I know that you have enjoyed watching him get better after surgery.

name: Chuck Outlaw
text: We took our Yorkie after hours for what appeared to be a very bad allergic reaction. They did a fantastic job treating our dog, stayed with her overnight and we got her home the next afternoon and she has done great! Thank you SRVES!

resp.text: Thank you Chuck for the kind review.  We are thankful that we could help and happy to do it.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Ted Folsom
text: They charged me 900.00 for a procedure to remove something that  clogged my dogs breathing. Did not help one bit she actually got worse. Took her to another vet within one week because the dog was getting worse. The second vet informed me had a severe sinus infection, she was anemic and her liver enzymes were high. He also got her records from SRVS and nothing was removed blocking my dogs airways which is why my dog had the 900.00 dollar procedure. My dog was given antibiotics, iron, and pills.for her liver.fromthesecond vet. She is much better after three days on the medicine, I wasted nearly a thousand dollars at this place do not go to this place I still wonder what was done here for my dog. Wish I give  no stars.

resp.text: There appears to be some confusion about what our veterinarian did regarding your dogs care.  Based on the information given, it was suspected that your dog had eaten some of its bed and that it was causing the airway obstruction.  The veterinarian noted after the procedure, that the stuffing material may not have been the ultimate cause of the clinical signs and that a follow up with your veterinarian would be necessary if symptoms got worse.  We are thankful that you followed up with your veterinarian and that your dog is doing well.  We are happy to speak with you over the phone if you have more questions about your visit early this month.

name: Stephanie Turner
text: I am thoroughly recommending to everyone!

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with us.  Please let us know if we can do anything else.

name: BELINDA HALLMAN
text:
I will forever be grateful for Dr. Martin and the entire staff at SRVS! Our 18 month old Chihuahua Pee Wee was outside on Mother's Day playing when he took off running through the woods chasing a squirrel. When Pee Wee came out of the woods he was limping and wouldn't put any weight on one of his back legs, so we took him to the vet. After having x rays done we were informed Pee Wee had indeed broken his leg and the best option with the best outcome was surgery.
